name: Regenerating BHA Exfoliating Cleanser
about: What it is:A natural daily exfoliator that buffs and polishes with BHA and apricot microspheres to reveal smooth, radiant healthy-looking skin..Skin Type:Dry and Combination.Skincare Concerns:Dullness and Uneven Texture, Pores, and Dryness.Formulation:Scrub.Highlighted Ingredients:.Ingredient Callouts:Free of toxins, fillers, artificials, synthetics, and GMOs. This product is vegan, cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Tata Harper is a real skincare company. They do it all themselves with their own chemists at their own farm. No synthetics. No outsourcing. No shortcuts.
ingredients: -Apricot Seed Powder: Gently and effectively exfoliates the skin to reveal smooth, glowing skin...-Pomegranate Enzymes: Dissolve buildup and blackheads...-Willow Bark: Sloughs away dead skin and minimizes appearance of pores. ..-French Pink Clay: Helps thoroughly cleanse and detoxify the skin. ...Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Olivate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Seed Powder, Sorbitan Olivate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract*, Lactobacillus/Punica Granatum Fruit Ferment Extract, Leuconostoc Ferment Filtrate, Water, Coco-Glucoside, Cetearyl Glucoside, Kaolin (Rose Clay), Sclerotium Gum, Cetyl Palmitate, Salix Alba (Willow) Bark Extract*, Sorbitan Palmitate, Sorbitan Olivate, Sodium Phytate, Denatured Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol, Aroma**, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Citronellol, Eugenol, Geraniol, Limonene, Linalool...*Ingredients from organic farming. **Clinical grade essential oils blend........The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use AM and PM..-Apply onto dry skin..-Massage a quarter size amount onto face and neck until product turns white, then rinse with warm water. Follow with essence.                                                                                                                                           .. Precautions:.-Avoid direct contact with eyes.

reviews.review_text: As a beauty professional with over 25 years of experience, Iu2019ve tried countless cleansers. The Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser stands out as a luxurious option. This 100% natural, non-toxic product is ideal for anyone looking for gentle exfoliation and deep cleansing in one easy step. Its creamy formula infused with apricot microspheres and BHAs is made from white willow bark. It helps provide a polished, radiant finish without being overly rough. Although I tu2019s an effective solution for all skin types, I especially love it for those of us with dull, uneven texture and pore congestion.  What I love most about this cleanser is its ability to refine and brighten the skin while maintaining its natural moisture barrier. The soft citrus and floral scent make every use feel like a spa experience. It also offers a blend of pomegranate enzymes and aloe vera which renew the skin gently while soothing any redness or irritation. For my clients with sensitive skin, I recommend using it 2-3 times a week as an exfoliant rather than a daily cleanser to avoid over exfoliation or dryness.   If youu2019re on a clean beauty journey or simply seeking high performance skincare, this is a great option. It works great as the first step in a morning or evening routine, it leaves the skin soft, smooth, and prepped for serums and moisturizers. If youu2019re serious about maintaining a radiant complexion and love products that combine efficacy with eco-luxury, the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser is worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really have enjoyed trying this cleanser for the first time and continuing to use it. The texture was a welcomed suprise with very small grits in the gel to help gently exfoliate the skin. The cleanser was gentle but still helped to exfoliate the dead skin cells. I did not find it overly striping at all for my dry, sensitive skin. I like that this formula also has BHAs in the formula to help with a chemical exfoliation while simultaneously exfoliating with the physical apricot partials. The packaging of course is also very nice. The glass bottle is sleek and elegant and gives luxury. I would only use this scrub every other day at the most for my dry skin however I did love the effect it gave when using it with the waterlock moisturizer. Overall a great scrub

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying this brand and this regenerating cleanser is amazing: itu2019s a daily exfoliating treatment that feels great on my oily skin. Itu2019s not harsh which was my first impression when I put it into my fingers. Itu2019s really gently yet effective in removing impurities or left over make up. I feel it opens up and cleans deeply my pores without stripping my skin like other exfoliators do. Itu2019s not only effective but also it smells unbelievable amazing! The bottle is a strong heavy glass with a nice pump. Itu2019s a really luxurious look and feeling. After trying Iu2019ve been incorporating into my routine for many days now and my skin hasnu2019t become dry. I totally recommended it. Not sure if someone with sensitive skin will react same way but my skin took it amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Tata Harper Regenerating BHA Exfoliating Cleanser for a few weeks now, and it has truly transformed my skincare routine. From the beautiful green glass bottle to the natural citrusy scent, every detail of this cleanser screams luxury. The dual-action formula combines physical exfoliants like apricot microspheres with chemical exfoliants (BHA) derived from white willow bark. It leaves my skin feeling baby-soft without being too abrasive or causing irritation. Perfect for daily use, even on my somewhat sensitive skin. Itu2019s not just a cleanseru2014it also brightens and smooths the skin. My complexion looks more clear and less red! The pics speak for themself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in my thirties and have combination skin that means oily. I love cleansers that are effective and that help me be less shiny. The regenerating cleanser is a game changer for my combination skin. The packaging is so beautiful, soft and I love its green and yellow colors. I started by applying and massaging gently on my dry skin, until it turned white. The cleaner is creamy and grainy. The exfoliant part is so gentle and left my skin so very soft. I did not need to massage my face for too long for the cleaner to turn white, and then I added water which melted the cleanser. My skin was left extremely soft and absolutely matte, no shine to be seen. There was a bit of tightness but nothing to be worried about. The scent of the cleanser was sweet. I loved my experience!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past two weeks I have really noticed a difference in my skin! The physical exfoliation is so nice right now, especially  in the winter when I have some flaking skin and need to prep my skin surface before applying makeup. The smell is so nice and clean and reminds me of a fancy spa treatment. This regenerating cleanser does its job to clean my face and exfoliate the surface but is not irritating at all which is shocking because every other physical exfoliating cleanser that I have tried has made my face burn or itch or turn red. I like to use an oil cleanser as my first step and then switch between this and the clarifying cleanser to give my skin a break from the exfoliation. Using this in conjunction with the Tata Harper face mask and the other facial cleanser has made my pores look so clean and my face feels so glowy in the mornings!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have only been using the Tata Harper Regenerating Exfoliating Cleaner for two weeks and the positive effect it has already had on my dry skin is amazing!  I have dramatically less flakes on my cheeks, as you can see in my before and after closeup.   The application is unique in that you apply the exfoliating cleanser to a dry face - I felt like this really amped up the polishing effect/feeling and it was a simple 30 seconds added to my routine.  I have been doing a double-cleanse by following up with the Tata Harper Clarifying Cleanser.   This product smells great, works quickly, and has delivered the results I was looking for.  It rinses clean and leaves my skin feeling smooth and looking soft and touchable. I am also happy to report that the exfoliants did not irritate or exacerbate my broken capillaries. I would recommend this product to any of my dry skin friends without hesitation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very new to Tata Harper and was so excited to use this regenerating cleanser. It's exfoliating since it has apricot seed powder yet very gentle, my skin feels smooth and very clean, not stripped (thank you kaolin clay) after washing.  After the initial use, I didn't apply moisturizer after to see if the cleanser would dry out my skin and make it oily later, but to my surprise it didn't. My skin felt hydrated and not dry nor oily. I love that it doesn't contain any dyes or fragrance, and they use fruit extract & essential oils for this, love the scent which makes me feel relaxed & calm. My pores look cleaner after 2 weeks of usage. I think my skin tone is more even & brighter. My breakout is less inflamed, which is my main concern when I try any new product, thank goodness that this is not the case. Finally, I love the glass bottle, i'm a sucker for anything glass, I feel fancy & indulged while using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper is one of my favorite brands for clean beauty that is extremely effective and looks good while doing it. this cleanser is another one of their game changers that really made a major difference in my skin care routine. it has ingredients like pomegranate enzymes, white willow bark, and apricot microspheres. as you massage this product into your skin you can really feel the apricot microspheres exfoliating your skin in such a gentle way, my skin feels deeply cleansed and not stripped at all after I rinse it off. It feels like I gave my face an entire facial in just one quick wash, my skin felt refreshed and renewed. as always I love the fragrance of the cleanser it smells sweet and not overpowering, it smells floral but not like flowers it's so hard to explain but I love it! and I love everything about this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Tata Harper Regenerating BHA Exfoliating Cleanser and I must say, I love the packaging! It has a super fancy feel to it. In terms of the product, I love the exfoliating feeling as my skin feels super clean afterwards without feeling stripped. The cleanser has a scent to it that I feel like reminds me of a fancy spa or salon. I have noticed my skin to feel much cleaner afterwards as well as polished. After implementing this cleanser into my morning and nighttime skincare routines for the past two weeks, I've noticed my pores to be far less pronounced. Additionally, I've also noticed the acne on my face reduce drastically which is great knowing this product is truly cleaning my skin properly. I highly recommend this for those with dry and sensitive skin as I did not have any irritation.

reviews.review_title: Great for rough and textured skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This Regenerating Cleanser from Tata Harper is hands down the best cleanser Iu2019ve ever used! Iu2019ve tried every cleanser from high end to drugstore and nothing has come close to the results this gives me.   Iu2019ve always struggled with rough and textured skin no matter how many scrubs, moisturizers, etc I try. After one use of this, my skin felt so buttery smooth and soft and my foundation applied like a dream instead of the usual patchy mess. After continued use, my skin is brighter, pores are smaller and I have no more flakey skin! Another benefit Iu2019ve noticed is that with my dead skin gone, all my other skincare products are able to penetrate deeper and deliver better results. I think pictures are worth a thousand words and the difference is clear in my before and after pictures. If you struggle with flakey textured skin, this product, though pricy, is 100% worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is so good! I love the packaging itu2019s very easy to use and user friendly. I really love the smell of this product smells really expensive and luxurious and gives a spa like experience to using this product. The product itself is easy to use appt dry and rub in and it instantly starts exfoliating the skin while still staying gentle on the skin. I really like that this product can be used everyday without being irritating. I really appreciate this product being so easy to remove it doesnu2019t take a bunch of washing and tugging comes usually in one wipe and leaves the skin really glowy and not dried out. Did receive this product for free for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this face scrub right off the bat; the bottle has a lux feel to it and it looks beauty in your bathroom or on your sink. The formula itself left my skin feeling clean and buffed without stripped or dry. Even though I have oily to combo skin, I do live in a dry climate and with the colder months coming, I don't want something that dried my face out even more. The beads inside the formula are not irritating or harsh and don't scratch up my face. I like to even mix this with their other face wash to get the benefits of both. The scent is also light and smells great, but it is something to note if you don't like too much fragrance in your face products. I only use the scrub 2-3 times a week even though it says you can use it daily. I like that is also has a chemical exfoliate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this to try and I finally got it. I love how it really cleanse my skin deeply. It leave my skin looking young and polish. The texture feels luxurious .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The gentleness of this exfoliating cleanser is excellent. I donu2019t have sensitive skin but exfoliating can add redness. This cleanser does not cause any irritation for me. My skin feels refreshed and clean like Iu2019ve used an exfoliant without the harsh effects.   I see a noticeable improvement to my skin. It feels like it has been regenerated and renewed. My face is soft and smooth to the touch after using. My makeup goes on smoothly without a textured finish.   The bottle the cleanser comes in, is a beautiful classic look. The ingredients target cleaning without irritating the skin. This cleanser works great for most skin types because itu2019s not harsh. It gets deep down in your pores to reduce texture. Itu2019s a must have for your skincare routine.

reviews.review_title: A body scrub for your face!!!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. It's basically the best cleanser i have ever used. It is actually like a body scrub for your face. It is a little rough but it remove all those dead skin cells! Seriously love it so much! Tata harper ate!

I tried the regenerating cleanser by Tata Harper and really enjoyed using it!    I have combination dry skin and look for cleansers that make my pores tighter and also not dry my skin.  This is a great cleanser for me.  I also love the clean ingredients and also the fancy glass bottle.  Itu2019s a great addition to my skincare routine.    My skin feels soft and also supple after using this cleanser.  It also is a great size and I will continue to use it.    I also find that this is great at gently exfoliating my skin and also makes my textured skin feel smoother and also soft.  I find it is easy to use and I used it daily for two weeks and it hasnu2019t made my skin sensitive or breakout.  I think itu2019s a great cleanser to use and also check out!  I recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I generally avoid scrubby cleansers because my skin just can't take it. Most scrubs on the market that I've tried leave my skin feeling a little roughed up so I have always just steered clear of them. I prefer very gentle physical exfoliation which is why this is the one exfoliating cleanser on the market today that I'm okay with. It's so gentle but also very effective. My skin feels regenerated and soft and fresh when I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cleanser! My skin type leans more towards oily so I struggle with blackheads and buildup. Iu2019m happy to have found a gentle exfoliating cleanser that actually feels like itu2019s a gentle exfoliant! They usually seem to be too rough for my skin. I can actually see this as a daily exfoliant. The scent of this product is actually really pleasant. I normally donu2019t like scent in my skincare because it seems to linger but this one doesnu2019t- it seems to be a nice orange morning scent? Either way I really like it. It has a really fine grain that cleanses away. I feel like Iu2019m taking off the day really easily without having to do much work. When it comes to exfoliant facial cleansers, make sure youu2019re not rubbing your skin too hard!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this cleanser for about two weeks now, and have all positive things to report. It smells great because they use real plants as their active ingredients and donu2019t need to add fragrance  This is an exfoliating face wash. It has a soft/medium exfoliant level, which I really like because itu2019s enough to actually do something. This product has a creamy texture that thickens as you rub it in and doesnu2019t make a mess. Because of the texture and moisturizing ingredients your skin feels soft and brighter, and not tight and stripped.   I like to use it in the morning as it helps my makeup look better, and brightens me up. I've been a makeup artist for 20 years, and exfoliating before makeup makes a HUGE difference. Skincare absorbs better- all the things. I cannot say enough good things about this cleanser! I added photos- before is in the white, after is 2 weeks later of regular use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not going to lie I was a little bit apprehensive to try this product after feeling the texture. I was worried that it was going to be too abrasive for my skin. But in true Tata Harper fashion, they proved me wrong again. For someone with sensitive and dry skin, I used to think that I couldnu2019t use scented products and exfoliating products because they would further dry out my skin, but after using this regenerating cleanser for a couple of days, I noticed that my skin wasnu2019t dry and dull as it typically is after washing my face which is shown in my before image. My face was typically ashy white EVERY single time I washed my face until I tried the regenerating cleanser. I loved how visibly, bright, and radiant my skin was. This was a game-changer for my skincare routine. I disliked having to rely on thick moisturized all the time to keep my face moisturized. I learned from using this entire line that my first defense to treat dull and dry skin is using a high-quality cleanser. I absolutely loved this product and how it transformed my skin in a matter of days. It lathers up well, and a little bit goes a long way. As a bonus, I am so glad the signature citrusy scent is still present, itu2019s the highlight of my morning routine.

reviews.review_title: Leaves Your Skin Feeling Refreshed And Radiant
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a good exfoliating treatment. It isnu2019t harsh and it gently exfoliates my skin. I have seen and heard so much buzz about this brand and the products and let me just say the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser is one of my new favorites. This is the product I didnu2019t know I needed in my line up. I apply a couple pumps of this product to dry skin and then gently rub in a circular motion until the product turns white and then follow with rinsing. You can feel the grittiness of this product but at the same time it is gentle on the skin! The product has a very pleasant earthy citrus scent to it. The best part is, once you rinse it off, your skin seriously feels so soft and smooth. It has made the texture of my skin look so much better and my skin feels rejuvenated after using this scrub. It doesnu2019t leave my skin feeling tight or stripped. If you are looking for a product that leaves your skin feeling refreshed and radiant you absolutely need to try the Tata Harper Regenerating Exfoliating Cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In the past, I have been slow to try new exfoliating products in my skincare regimen because my skin can sometimes be reactive and the wrong scrub can absolutely wreck my skin barrier. However I shouldnu2019t have been concerned because Tata Harper delivered as always with their Regenerating BHA Exfoliating Cleanser. Packed full of high performance botanical ingredients that are not only 100% natural but also largely organic, this defoliating cleanser uses chemical and physical exfoliation to dissolve buildup, refine pores, and hydrate and plump skin. The formula is gentle enough to use every day to buff and polish dull, uneven skin revealing a radiant, healthy face. After two weeks of use, my skin looks brighter, smoother, and more hydrated. My pores even look smaller! Using it together with their resurfacing mask and clarifying cleanser has been an absolute game changer for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I love that this cleanser is a super subtle exfoliant that doesnu2019t leave my skin dry. I was a bit hesitant to use this as exfoliants in the winter time can cause skin to get worse, but this cleanser does not do that at all. I have very oily skin and it gets rid of all my oil while giving me an even surface to put on other products. I love using this in the morning when I wake up as my skin feels super oily but this does wonders. I love the smell as well. Itu2019s subtle and not overpowering. Highly recommend trying this especially if you have oily skin and want that wonderful glow without overly drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for about a Two week period I can only base my review on that. I like how moisturizing the exfoliating cleanser feels, it isnu2019t too harsh on my skin when Iu2019m massaging it on my face. It has an almost relaxing aroma.  I donu2019t know if itu2019s too soon to tell but I kind of see an almost so slightly brighter complexion. I tend to have a lot of texture because of my oily skin but Iu2019ve noticed that it is looking smoother. These colder months play tricks on me and dry out my skin so I feel like the thickness and hydrating properties have been helping to balance out whatever Mother Nature is trying to do. The only thing I donu2019t love is that because it is thick it feels like I have to use more water and massage my face more in order to get the product off more, other than that I am liking the product.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is for anyone looking for a fresh start! My skin feels so renewed every time I use this cleanser. As someone with more dry and sensitive skin, I'm always cautious when looking for cleansers. However, this one delivers. It actually feels a bit soothing on my sensitive skin. It has the signature Tata Harper floral scent. With sensitive skin I'm weary of fragrances, but this one is mild and pleasant making for a great addition. The bottle design, like the other Tata Harper cleansers, is top-tier! I absolutely love the glass bottle design. It makes it feel luxurious, which I would expect with this price point. It also functions well and looks aesthetic. For anyone looking for clean skincare, I would definitely recommend the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has been absolutely fantastic for my very sensitive skin, it has a very mild grain to it which feels wonderful when massaging gently onto my skin, I wouldnu2019t say this should be used on a daily basis but I have thoroughly enjoyed using the regenerating cleanser multiple times a week for these past 2 weeks. I have always loved Tata Harperu2019s formula when developing and using their products and I feel the care and quality of the ingredients they use on each formulation is really great. The morning after I used this product my skin felt very soft and I feel it did a great job at getting rid of my accumulated dead skin cells and de-congesting my pores. As someone who struggles to find good exfoliating treatments I can guarantee that this is a great option for everyone with every skin type!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used the regenerating cleanser from Tata Harper and here are my thoughts.  As an exfoliant, you canu2019t go wrong with this product.  I have used it every day on my dry skin, and the directions to apply it is straightforward and to the point.  My skin after using this product is night and day.  I love how my skin has this beautiful, radiant glow where I feel so much more confident physically and mentally.  I feel like I can take on any challenge head on during the day.    I also like that the product is certified vegan and is cruelty free.  With me being an animal lover and a vegan-in-progress, I find this commendable and want to support Tata Harper as much as I can.  The smell is also very pleasant.  It has this apricot like smell that I can smell all day and night without issue.  Smell for me is important because anything that is too strong, I get turned off by it.  However this cleanser doesnu2019t have too much of a strong smell, and I can handle it easily  I recommend this product to anyone that wants a beautiful and glowing skin and feel great about themselves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser is a luxurious exfoliating cleanser formulated with natural and organic ingredients that work synergistically to cleanse, exfoliate, and revitalize the skin.  One of the standout features of the Regenerating Cleanser is its gentle yet effective exfoliation properties. The formula contains apricot seed powder and willow bark extract, which help to slough away dead skin cells and impurities, leaving my skin feeling smooth and refreshed. After regular use of this cleanser, I noticed it has helped improve the texture and tone of my skin, resulting in a more radiant complexion.  In addition to its exfoliating benefits, the Regenerating Cleanser is also enriched with botanical extracts and essential oils that nourish and hydrate my skin. Ingredients such as aloe vera, grapefruit, and neroli help to soothe and calm the skin, while promoting a healthy glow.  I love its luxurious texture and spa-like scent, making it a pleasure to use as part of my skincare routine.  Overall, the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser is a highly effective and indulgent skincare product that delivers on its promises of gentle exfoliation, deep cleansing, and skin rejuvenation. If you are looking for a high-quality cleanser that will leave your skin looking and feeling revitalized, the Regenerating Cleanser by Tata Harper may be worth considering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser for two weeks now, applying it 2u20133 times a week, and itu2019s quickly become a staple in my skincare routine. Its semi-thick, creamy texture with fine exfoliating beads feels gentle yet effective, and the fresh, tropical scent is so refreshing; it feels like a little spa moment at home.  On days I plan to dermaplane my face, I spend extra time working it into my skin because it does an amazing job at removing dead skin. This step makes my skin incredibly soft and ensures a closer shave. Even with this added exfoliation, it doesnu2019t leave my combination skin feeling dry or irritated. The exfoliation beads are small enough that it doesn't irritate or rub my skin hard.   After just a few uses, Iu2019ve noticed my skin feels smoother and a little more even-toned. It doesnu2019t make my face feel greasy or look oily. I apply it to my dry skin first and rub it in until it emulsifies to a white color and lighter consistency before washing off with warm water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser is a luxurious, all-natural product that delivers a spa-like experience with every use. Designed for dull and uneven skin, this daily exfoliating cleanser combines gentle physical exfoliants with enzymes to deeply cleanse and rejuvenate the skin.  The creamy formula includes apricot microspheres and natural BHA from willow bark, which help to remove dead skin cells and unclog pores without feeling harsh. The scent, a blend of botanical ingredients, is refreshing and uplifting. After just a few uses, my skin felt noticeably smoother, brighter, and more refined.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adored this cleanser. I have never tried Tata Harperu2019s products before so I started using it on a blank slate. I really enjoyed that the cleanser had to be applied on dry skin. That was new and different. I really felt the particles working to exfoliate my skin. It did not take long for the cleanser to turn white while massaging it on my skin. Even though Iu2019m in my twenties, I worry about aging from tugging on my skin unnecessarily. Oh the scent, it smells tropical almost like papaya, pineapples and fruits like that. My skin felt so smooth once I rinsed it off. It is exactly what I needed during this dry winter weather. My skin needed the exfoliation and moisturization. My skin did not feel dry at all. It had a glow, felt smooth and plump.  This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_title: A gentle yet effective regenerating cleanser!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Tata Harper Regenerating BHA Exfoliating Cleanser gave my dry/sensitive skin the boost it needs to recover. Because of the weather, my skin became very very dry and felt like a sandpaper. Even with the routine I had from before cannot save it. I used it as a day and night cleanser during the first week but noticed that the best way for me to use this is only one time and at night. So this is now my staple night time cleanser. I love that the beads are not harsh on the skin and that the smell of this is my favorite among all the cleansers I have tried from the brand. You can visibly see the brightness that it gives. This cleanser is not harsh on the skin even if ai use it as a quick daily facial by leaving it on for 5 minutes before rinsing. If you have sensitive skin like me, do not hesitate to try this cleanser specially if you have acne prone skin as it might be the solution you have been looking for. Love this brand and its ideals. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A-freaking-mazing! I was looking for a scrub and I got the smaller size - lasted me 6 months! Great feel, good exfoliation. Great for everyday or bi-weekly use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lately, due to some medical changes, I have gotten dry patches mostly around my nose and mouth region. I usually try to stay away from exfoliators as I feel like they just make my skin worse. This exfoliator has both physical and chemical exfoliators. Im not going to lie, I was concerned with the apricot microspheres, but to my surprise, they were extremely small and not jagged like I assumed. When I put it on my bare dry face, I felt the microspheres at work, but it did not hurt at all. I also noticed a scent that I actually liked but did not linger on the skin. The BHA chemical exofliation comes from white willow bark and after a couple of days, I could see the difference. My face looked brighter, felt softer and best of all did not break out from it. Though this is a gentle exfoliator, I now do not use it every day as my medication is pretty strong, but that is my unique circumstance. For normal everyday people, I would say it is okay to use every day for a gentle exfoliation. However, since everyone is different, I would just recommend using however many times a week you see fit for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m absolutely in love with the Regenerating Cleanser from Tata Harper itu2019s incredible. Every time I use it, I feel like Iu2019m enveloped in the most refreshing burst of citrus, which always leaves me craving oranges afterward. The fragrance alone makes this cleanser a sensory delight.  What makes this cleanser truly unique is how versatile and effective it is. I love that I can use it directly on dry skin. I pour a small amount onto my hands, massage it onto my face, and then gradually add just a little water. The process feels luxurious. As I wet my hands and continue massaging, the formula gently emulsifies, making it easy to rinse off completely. Itu2019s a small ritual that feels both effective and indulgent.  One of the standout features for me is how smooth and soft my skin feels after each use. Despite being an exfoliating cleanser, it never strips or irritates my skin. The microbeads give it a traditional exfoliating feel, similar to a sugar scrub, but the texture is refined and gentle. Itu2019s powerful enough to polish away dead skin but delicate enough for daily use. Iu2019ve found that with gentle massaging, it works beautifully without needing to apply much pressure.  This cleanser hits all the right notes for meu2014itu2019s a fantastic daily exfoliator, it leaves my skin glowing and smooth, and the scent is pure heaven. Itu2019s easily a 5 out of 5 in my book, especially for exfoliating cleansers. If youu2019re looking for a product that feels both effective and luxurious, I canu2019t recommend this one enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The **Tata Harper Regenerating BHA Exfoliating Cleanser** is a luxurious and effective skincare gem. It combines gentle physical exfoliation with natural BHAs, leaving the skin polished and radiant without irritation. The creamy texture, infused with apricot microspheres, feels indulgent, while the fresh, botanical scent elevates the experience. Ideal for those seeking a brighter complexion, it smooths texture and unclogs pores with consistent use. While on the pricier side, its clean, non-toxic formula and noticeable results make it a worthwhile splurge for anyone aiming for glowing, rejuvenated skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this cleanser for my textured skin. I am in my 30s and I have oily combination skin. The colder weather has caused me to severely breakout. Iu2019ve noticed a great improvement using this cleanser daily. My skin is softer and smoother. It is more radiant. My pores have also been getting smaller. Iu2019ve noticed my breakouts and acne scars smoothing as I use this. I enjoy that you can exfoliate with this without water before rinsing off. It is a very gentle exfoliation. It does not strip my skin. The willow bark extract has also really helped to control my breakouts daily. I have noticed a difference in my skin after using this product for 14 days. I will continue to use it. I also enjoy the natural scent and ingredients it contains. It doesnu2019t irritate my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not a super huge fan of physical scrub exfoliators with natural seed exfoliants like apricot or walnut. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a long time Esti and Skincare lover who has worked in both clinical and high end retail settings Tata Harper is a brand I know and love. This brand is not only luxurious inside and out they have high performance, quality ingredients at levels that are safe for the every day consumer but effective enough to use in a spa room. Tata Harper uses natural ingredients with a focus on being gentle to even the most sensitive skin. I tried the Regenerating Cleanser - perfect since I am out of my exfoliating products! This cleanser is a cream based cleanser - I didnu2019t notice a scent with it and it does have physical exfoliant. The beads are very very small and reminded me of pumice but they are actually made of apricot seed powder. I would give this 5 stars but I found the grit hard to remove at the sink. There are also AHAs in this cleanser for chemical exfoliation and brightening. I noticed my skin did appear much lighter and brighter after using this! I think this would be great for any skin type since it is so gentle but particularly for someone with dry or aging skin since it's creamy and moisturizing. I will keep this one in the shower so I donu2019t over do it with exfoliation and so the grit rinses off easier!

One of my favorite qualities of this cleanser is its dual-action formula. It combines physical exfoliation with enzymatic ingredients to dissolve impurities and refine the skinu2019s texture. I have acne prone skin, and have plenty of post acne scars to show for it. Iu2019m hoping that over time, my scars and dark spots will fade. reviews.review_text: This review was collected as part of a promotion. After rinsing, I find that I don't need the heavy moisturizer I normally use now that I've been using this product for over a month. reviews.review_title: Tata Harper Skincare Regenerating Cleanser Review
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper Skincare Regenerating Cleanser has quickly become a favorite in my skincare routine. This cruelty-free, vegan cleanser offers a luxurious experience that stands out in several key ways.  Smell and Texture: The smell is divine, with a refreshing, natural fragrance that makes each use feel like a mini spa session. The texture is sandy and creamy, providing a unique exfoliating experience. Itu2019s incredibly gentle yet effective, and feels wonderful on the skin.  Exfoliation: The Regenerating Cleanser excels at gently exfoliating the skin. It doesnu2019t have the typical beads but rather a soft, sandy texture that works to slough away dead skin cells without causing irritation. My skin feels smooth, revitalized, and refreshed after each use.  Effectiveness: After using this cleanser, my skin feels exceptionally clean, soft, and glowing. It effectively removes impurities and provides a noticeable boost to my complexion. I appreciate that it exfoliates while also hydrating, preventing any dryness or tightness.  Packaging: The packaging is beautiful and luxurious, coming in a stunning green glass bottle. It adds an elegant touch to my skincare collection and enhances the overall experience.  Ethical Standards: Knowing that this product is cruelty-free and vegan adds to its appeal. It's reassuring to use a high-quality product that aligns with my values of sustainability and animal welfare.  Overall, the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser is a fantastic addition to any skincare regimen. Its delightful smell, gentle yet effective exfoliation, luxurious packaging, and commitment to ethical standards make it a standout product. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a luxurious and conscientious skincare experience.

The Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser is a daily exfoliating treatment that really delivers! Itu2019s a BHA exfoliator that gently buffs your skin, leaving it smooth and radiant! Itu2019s also a daily cleansing and exfoliating treatment that buffs and polishes for radiant healthy looking skin. It has BHA and apricot microspheres to reveal smooth healthy skin! Itu2019s also for dry and combination skin.The natural BHA from white willow bark extract : cleans and clears the look of pores.The olive oil liquid crystal complex: moistures and softens skin. It is free of toxins , fillers ,artificials, synthetics, and GMOs.This product is vegan and cruelty-free.This Tata Harper smells like green beauty .This 100 percent natural formula smells like the roots, stems, and absolute essence of every single natural ingredient in the green bottle.

reviews.review_title: Cleansing and Exfoliation in one product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a skincare enthusiast, you could say that I am a bit addicted to exfoliating my skin. Coming from the days of the peach walnut scrub (haha), I have gotten better about spacing it out and not completely destroying my skin with exfoliation. This cleanser really is the answer to my exfoliation/skincare prayers with both physical and chemical exfoliation properties. 100% natural ingredients mean that there are no harsh chemicals, only ingredients like pomegranate enzymes and apricot microspheres that work together to give you the smoothest, brightest, and plumpest skin. While diminishing pores, this cleanser also leaves your skin hydrated. I have had no rosacea breakouts or irritation with this cleanser either. The fragrance is so nice as well. I love everything about this cleanser and would recommend it for everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been searching for a daily exfoliating cleanser that is gentle on my skin, and I wasprovided the opportunity to try out an excellent one. The Tata Harper Regenerating Exfoliating Cleanser is a luxurious product that adds a touch of elegance to my bathroom vanity. It contains both physical exfoliants (apricot microspheres) and chemical exfoliants (BHA) made from all-natural ingredients.  The cleanser has a creamy and light texture with a fresh grapefruit scent that smells natural and amazing. After using it, my skin looks polished and radiant. I use it twice a day, and I feel very comfortable continuing to use it. I would highly recommend it to anyone, especially those with clogged pores and excess sebum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It doesnu2019t surprise me, that the Regenerating Cleanser is Tata Harperu2019s best selling cleanser!  Unlike most cleansers, this one is applied directly onto dry skin. While I usually rely on skincare products containing AHA's and BHA's to maintain a radiant complexion, sometimes I need a quick solution. The fine granules efficiently exfoliate and remove dead skin cells, leaving my skin incredibly smooth and radiant. Despite containing BHAs and fruit enzymes along with fine apricot powder, this cleanser feels gentle on the skin and is great for everyday use.  I adore everything about this cleanseru2014the packaging, scent, texture, and effectiveness. Regenerating Cleanser goes above and beyond the typical cleansing experience and has secured a spot on my list of must-have cleansers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a licensed beauty professional specializing in skincare and pro makeup artistry for over 25 years, I've found Tata Harper's Regenerating Cleanser to be a true all-in-one product. It effectively removed my dead skin cells, makeup residue, and impurities, leaving my skin glowing and smooth. It's gentle yet powerful, suitable for all skin types,and I found it perfect for daily use if you're after a consistent radiant complexion. However, it's important to be cautious around sensitive areas or any cuts.  I love that it is packaged in a stylish bottle with an easy-to-use pump, it adds a touch of elegance to my skincare routine. The subtle scent, featuring Magnolia essence, enhances the overall experience, making it feel fresh and indulgent on my skin.  When I applied the cleanser it provided a refreshing feeling, revitalized my skin and left it looking youthful and thoroughly cleansed without any dryness. With its spa-like qualities, Tata Harper's Regenerating Cleanser is going to become a beloved addition to my skincare regimen, offering a rejuvenating experience every time I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So I had never heard of this brand before trying this product line. As a medical aesthetician Iu2019m always interested and curious about new lines and what in interesting on the market. Iu2019ve worked in the cosmetics and skincare industry for twenty years now and have seen it develop and change so much. This cleanser I wouldnu2019t really classify as a cleanser. Itu2019s really an exfoliant. It smells great and is very effective but itu2019s way to harsh to be marketed as a cleanser. I can easily see people over using it twice a day and over exfoliating their skin and damaging the moisture barrier with this product. The texture of the product and packaging are great though and I love the product. I really just think it needs to be rebranded as an exfoliating treatment product and not a cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Beauty Enthusiast and lover of skincare. I am always on the hunt for high quality skin care products that provide noticeable results.  I have recently been using the Regenerating Cleanser by Tata Harper. This cleanser comes in a 4.1 fl oz/ 125 ml glass bottle. This product is definitely a 2 in 1 product that works as both a cleanser and an exfoliator. And honestly I am blown away by the results. In just a short week of using this cleanser, I can feel and see a difference in my skin. My skin feels healthy and looks fresh.  This cleanser is light brownish and orangish in color and has a very fresh, citrusy scent that I found to be very soothing. I use this cleanser in the night time. It is very easy to use. I use two pumps of this cleanser and gently start massaging this on my face. The cleanser has a very creamy yet grainy texture and starts turning white after massaging on the face. After massaging on my face for about 30 seconds, I add a few drops of water and keep further massaging on my face. After 30 more seconds I rinse it off with warm water.  I really like how my skin feels after using this cleanser. My skin feels extremely clean, soft and smooth after using this cleanser. This cleanser not only helps to remove all the dead skin cells but also refreshes and brightens my skin. It is gentle enough to use every single day revealing glowy shiny skin.  This has become one of my favorite cleansers. And I highly recommend it to others as this will definitely leave your skin soft, supple, smooth and hydrated.  **This review was collected as part of a promotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was super excited to try the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser especially for my dry, flaky, aging skin! This cleanser is highly recommended for people who have dull, uneven, or congested skin. I instantly  fell in love with this amazing exfoliating cleanser! Tata Harper is the ultimate gold star standard in luxury clean natural beauty! I love Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser! The scent of this cleanser immersed me in power of nature and botanicals! It has a beautiful natural herbal plant smell of the roots, stems, and absolute essence of every single natural ingredient in the bottle that is very calming creating a total sensory natural spa experience! The Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser has a rich creamy texture but also has gentle exfoliants of apricot microspheres and BHA from white willow bark that left my skin radiantly glowing immediately after use! I loved this sensory experience of this cleanser as I felt like I was receiving a natural spa face treatment but at home! This all natural cleanser is incredible because 100% of the total ingredients are from natural origin and 82% of the total ingredients are from Organic Farming. The Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser uses pomegranate enzymes, sunflower seed oil, and phytic acid to dissolve buildup. Then this beautifully crafted cleanser refines the pores with coral clay, pink grapefruit, and bergamont! To keep the skin plump, youthful and hydrated , this cleanser also contains aloe vera, crystalline coconut, and coconut liquid crystals! Use this cleanser day and night but probably a good idea to always wear sunscreen while using this cleanser because if the BHA exfoliants. I noticed my pores are less visible, my uneven skin texture is softened, and my skin overall looks brighter and more radiant! It is definitely a well crafted high quality product! I highly recommend Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser (BHA Exfoliator) for beautiful, soft, radiant skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m Dani a licensed cosmetologist of 9 years and a true beauty enthusiast. Tata Harper thought out their packaging wisely! Super thick and sturdy, glass bottle with nice pump. I am obsessed! The Regenerating Cleanser is everything plus more! Immediately, you feel a difference once applied onto your skin. I was hesitant to use a cleanser thatu2019s daily with exfoliating properties but I took the chance and was more than pleasantly surprised! Itu2019s super gentle but delivers serious results. Your skin feels so fresh and clean and light after rinsing off. I used this as directed on dry skin but also wanted to try it while in the shower on days I am rushing. I applied to wet skin and still had amazing results. I found that less is more with this product when using. 1 pump to not even a full pump was just enough. I highly recommend this product for those needing that deep clean with big results but gentle exfoliation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I have very sensitive, (and mature) ,skin and this cleanser does not irritate it at all, in fact my skins feels smoother and softer after rinsing!  After only 1 week of use my skin looks brighter and healthier as well.  The smell is fresh and beautiful.  I only wish I would have know about this cleaner much sooner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this cleanser/exfoliator. I used it years ago, then couldn't find it anywhere, and am overjoyed to see it back. I was using other products in the interim but nothing I found did the trick. I have really sensitive skin, as well as dry and flaky, often red patches. This is gentle enough I can use it daily, but I typically use it every other day. It gets rid of dead skin, but is so gentle. It doesn't make my face red, sting, feel too tight, or dry afterwards. I don't use it dry however - I dampen my face a little first. This leaves my skin feeling rejuvenated and refreshed, smooth, moisture enough that I won't flake, and my skin actually appears dewy now. My husband has been using it too, and he's seen a big improvement in his skin and blemishes which due to a hormone imbalance and medical condition - has been problomatic for years. This does the trick and keeps blackheads from forming.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: More of a scrub than a cleanser, this is one I wouldn't dream of using twice daily - it's just far too much exfoliation for me. In here you have both a manual exfoliator (Apricot seed powder) and a chemical exfoliant (Willowbark - high in BHA). The cleanser comes in a elegant green glass bottle and is a citrus-y smelling lotion cleanser. The Apricot seeds in it, despite how it might appear in the pictures, are very finely milled, we're definitely not talking St Ives here! I apply just over 1 pump of it onto my dampened face, massage it in and then rinse off. Admittedly all that exfoliation does help clear my pores, but if I do it every day I end up with some slightly red patches for a few minutes, so twice weekly seems to work out best for me. Now the good news is that because it's a partly oil-based cleanser, the formula isn't drying, despite its potent combination of exfoliants. But on the other hand it also does not foam and isn't the easiest of cleansers to rinse off, being oil-based. Every time I use it I feel as though some residue is left behind on my skin and requires either a second cleanse with something else, or otherwise a toner and cotton pad. What you end up with is a cleanser that's more geared to non-sensitive, drier skin types that require the extra hydration. Love the ingredients, as I do with every TH product I've tried, but not sure if this is one that I'd be rushing out to re-purchase once it's finished.   ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. Hair Loss Treatment: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Hair Oil  2. Shampoo: 'Sephora Collection' - Deep Cleaning Shampoo 3. Face Mask: u2018Peter Thomas Rothu2019 u2013 Pumpkin Enzyme Mask  4. Pigmentation + Anti-Aging Serum: u2018Divine Herbalu2019 - Facial Treatment Serum 5. Face Scrub: u2018Sisley' - Botanical Gentle Buffing Cream 6. Lip Balm: u2018Nuxeu2019 u2013 Reve De Miel Lip Balm 7. Lip Liner: u2018Sephora Collection' - Rouge Gel Lip Liner

Reminded me of St. Ives Apricot Scrub, but not nearly as abrasive. I recommend this product if your cheek skin is like your forehead skin and strong enough to handle facial scrubs.

Removing one point because I simply can not get past the fact that this smells exactly like a bowl of fruit loops! (Not necessarily a bad smell, just not something I want to use on my face.... plus it always made me crave them lol).

reviews.review_title: A Staple for My OIly, Acne-Prone Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I struggle with oily skin and breakouts, especially hormonal/stress breakouts on my chin. I've used lots of different exfoliating cleansers, and this has proven to be the most effective for my skin. The citrus scent is refreshing and the exfoliation feels like it gets the job done without being too harsh. I love the pump, and not having to fumble with a putting a lid back on a tube while holding product in my hands. Within a week or so of daily use, my breakouts have been more under-control and I haven't been getting as oily. The only downside for me is the price, which is more than I like to spend on a cleanser, but it works well enough for me that I've continued to repurchase despite this.

reviews.review_text: I received this Regenerating Cleanser complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for my honest opinion.  I was super excited to start using this cleanser because it had a beautiful bright citrucy scent and little exfoliating beads that I knew we're going to make my skin look and feel beautiful. I was not disappointed in any way and this is now my absolute favorite cleanser that I use both day-and-night. You start off applying it on dry skin and massage to exfoliate. The beads are very fine and gentle. Then you add water and continue cleansing and rinse.  My skin was clean without being stripped and it instantly felt soft and smooth.  It was also soothing and provided moisturization.  No tightness or irritation occurred.  The bottle itself has a luxe look and is made of glass.  I appreciate that because glass is much more eco-friendly.  I also really like that it comes in a pump and all ingredients are natural.  As a reference, I have oily, blemish prone skin.  I definitely recommend  to all.

reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper skin cleaner is very gently on my skin, yet leaves it feeling clean and refreshed. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a little skeptical. Wasn't there this huge controversy awhile ago about apricot seed and how it wasn't good for the skin? Before using this I patch tested on my hand to feel consistency and texture and immediately knew it was apricot seed. It has a sort of rough exfoliating texture. I personally know that apricot seed isn't good for my skin so I dare not even try.  I am disappointed they use it though. Maybe its grinded down so well that it doesn't affect many, but if you have sensitive or inflammatory skin its not recommended. I don't, but I am so cautious when it comes to exfoliating. I prefer rice powder. I was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Omg this is the best cleanser!! I absolutely love it!! Left my skin feeling refreshing and glowy!! Plus left it so soft!! I definitely recommend it! The scent is very light and a little goes a long way! This was gifted by tata Harper!

reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare. I love this face cleanser. I find this cleanser to be hydrating. I also find that it does a great job at exfoliating and that you can exfoliate with this everyday without any negative side effects.

reviews.review_title: Exfoliates gently without stripping my skin!

Iu2019m really pleased to have an all natural cleanser that clears toxins from my skin, while leaving it feeling soft and hydrated, I swear it makes my skin look more plump. reviews.review_text: I have wanted to try this cleanser for years but never took the plunge. My only disappointment is how long I waited! This product is phenomenal for someone like me. This exfoliating cleanser does have a light citrus scent but my skin isnu2019t bothered. Iu2019m not as concerned about fragrance in washes because Iu2019m not leaving the product on my skin for hours/ the whole day. Plus, itu2019s just a really beautiful scent. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I was very pleased with my results with this skincare and highly suggest using it in the morning. The fresh smell gives off green wooden pine vibes and will give you the start to your day that your looking for. This vegan product and cruelty free comes in recyclable packaging. I absolutely love the bottle it comes in as it always keeps your cleanser fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tatau2019s Regenerating Cleanser is a daily exfoliating treatment that targets dull and congested skin. The texture is creamy (it reminded me of a clay cleanser) with apricot microspheres and BHA from white willow bark to help remove the dead skin cells, unclog the pores, and leave the skin glowing, smooth and healthy. The tiny apricot particles didn't feel harsh on my skin, and the fragrance is very light, citrusy. I think it provides a luxurious experience. Although it is recommended to use a generous amount of this cleanser, I think you don't need a lot of it. This cleanser does a great job in removing the dead skin cells and making my skin look radiant and healthy. It doesn't leave my skin dry or feeling right. I prefer to use this cleanser 3x a week to avoid over-exfoliation.  The glass bottle adds a nice touch to the vanity and compared to other luxurious brands, the price of this cleanser is not so high.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

The combination of physical and chemical exfoliants leaves my skin incredibly soft and smooth, but it hasn't been overdrying, which I was concerned about. My complexion is brighter after using this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

Iu2019m huge into scents and this was perfect. I would definitely recommend this to a friend. Love this brand all around. This was gifted by Tata Harper skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I would highly recommend it and will be purchasing this regularly for part of my skincare routine.

I will add a word of caution to be mindful about using other products with exfoliants, as I cannot do anything else that even mildly exfoliates. I also don't think this would be for someone who cannot tolerate scent in their skincare (although it does not linger). Having said all that, it has greatly improved my skin, and I think it is worth giving it a try if you can afford the higher price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am very happy with this product, my skin feels so soft and velvety.

reviews.review_text: I have sensitive acne-prone skin. I didn't notice any glow after using this cleanser multiple times, it didn't dry out my skin which I appreciate, but aside from that no other benefits for me. The only beneficial ingredient I see is the BHA, and you can get a cheaper, more effective BHA product (i.e. Paula's Choice). This cleanser is not worth the hype or the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I saw no difference in my skin, compared to much cheaper facial cleansers. Save your money!

reviews.review_title: Truly gentle exfoliation for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried many, many exfoliating cleansers over the years, and most claim to be for all skin types. As I have aged and my skin has become more sensitive with rosacea, it's been difficult to find an exfoliant that doesn't strip my skin and leave it bright red, tight, and angry.  This one does none of that. It's super gentle, but still does the trick of sloughing away dead skin cells leaving my skin super soft. No dryness, no redness, no hyper-sensitivity. When I finish the smaller size that I purchased, I'll be repurchasing the larger bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love!! Holy Grail item. Smells like fruity pebbles or Trix cereal to me. Leaves skin feeling plump and polished. No phenoxyethanol!!!! This line is genuinely a true clean product.

reviews.review_title: Great exfoliation without destroying your skin

reviews.review_text: Favorite face wash. Gentle enough to use everyday. Love to pair with the resurfacing mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have struggled with acne my whole life. During my college years, my skin started to get really bad as I would get painful, hormonal cystic acne. Over the years, I have tried every cleanser/product imaginable to reduce my acne and the resultant dark spots. I've spent hundreds of dollars searching for the cleanser of my dreams, and I'm happy to finally say, that I found it! When I purchased this cleanser around two weeks ago, my acne had been the worst that it has been in a while. After using this consistently both morning and night, my skin has COMPLETELY changed. My acne has significantly gone down, and my face feels so glowy, hydrated, and clean 24/7. I have oily/combination skin, and although this product is suggested for dry skin, I find that it cleans my skin well while also maintaining moisture and hydration. Bottom line, I absolutely love this cleanser and will be purchasing the larger size once I'm out of the travel size. SO worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. Makes my face smooth, smells nice and I feel squeaky clean after. 5/5. But the downside is itu2019s very expensive for essentially a scrub... -1.

It leaked from the packaging which is the same as the larger retail package. I use the olehenriksen oil cleanser and I find it to be a very similar cleanser, citrusy and minty. I would not buy it because of the consistency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: What a disappointment! After all the glowing reviews, I was excited to get this. I tried it the first two nights and loved the way it felt. Then, day 3 I began to notice a few bumps on my cheeks and chin. I thought, well, maybe it is causing a bit of a skin purge. Each day more full blown teenage pimples began to appear. After ten days and a full face of acne, I stopped using it. With some extra TLC, I am 7 days out from stopping using it and my 65 yo skin is finally beginning to clear. Live and learn I guess. I went through the ingredients and did not see anything that might cause acne, but something caused this! This was returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!!! I saw an improvement in my skin in a matter of days! Im in love. The texture is great and smells lovely. Leaves my skin feeling clean, fresh and glowy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It's super soft for daily cleansing. The product last a lot. My skin is oily and it feels super clean after use it. The smell is delicious super fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy smooth exfoliation, perfect for sensitive skin , my skin is hydrated and shiny after every use, Re-buying !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Beware - may cause angry, red flare ups
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had high hopes for this product after reading so many great things about it. After just one use, my skin flared up and became red, blotchy, itchy, and irritated. Three days later and multiple attempts to hydrate those areas and mask with red relieving products, my skin continues to be sensitive to the touch. I do not have sensitive skin and have used the Dr Gross alpha beta clothes with no problem. But, there is something in this that doesn't agree with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for years! I've tried other options to replace this, but always come back to this one. I have sensitive skin so I have bad reactions to a lot of exfoliating cleansers. I find this to be a good alternative to the ExfoliKate Daily Foaming Cleanser. That one is too harsh and gives me a chemical burn. If you want something similar, this is a great option! It is gentle enough for sensitive skin, but effective and smells great. It removed my dead skin and leaves it prepped for makeup. If you have sensitive skin, I recommend the splurge on this product!

reviews.review_title: Gentle on sensitive skin, smells amazing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells almost like apple jacks or fruit loops, in the best way reminiscent of my childhood, which is nice to think of when youu2019re enjoying a warm shower. My face is definitely cleansed after this and you only need a small amount. The exfoliating part of the scrub is fine and not rough on your skin, very gentle. It leaves my skin super soft, and does not completely strip it of moisture. It does dry my skin, but not as much as most cleansers (even tatcha ones) would. I would definitely repurchase this if it didnu2019t have such a hefty price tag. Is it worth the money? Only if you have it. When mine runs out I will be looking for a dupe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this product on wanting to try something new happy I did my skin has cleared up and itu2019s not harsh on the skin and it smells likes oranges . Took about three weeks to clear up my skin but  it was worth it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tara Harper Skincare.  I love the fresh, cirtusy scent and how soft and hydrated this cleanser leaves my skin feeling without stripping my skin. Highly recommend if youu2019re looking for a new cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can't live without this cleanser.  I use it every morning and it's so light and hydrating but exfoliates at the perfect level.  The exfoliation is very fine and non-irritating but manages to get rid of any layer of skin that is going to make your makeup flake! It opens up your skin without stripping it. I use a retinol cream at night so this is an important step to not look dry and flaky during the day.  It also washes off without a struggle as some exfoliator products can be a pain to wash off outside the shower. It is very fragrant as Tata Harper products are. You don't need much, it goes a long way.  Having said all that, I'm not sure my skin could have tolerated it in my 20s.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: this product was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare Ok so first off, after I rinsed off the cleanser my face definitely felt soft. But I did noticed that after rinsing and drying my face it felt a little bit tight, and a little stripped, so I wouldn't call this a hydrating cleanser. I actually like the bright, citrus scent and I'm usually not fan of products with a scent. It was too overpowering and smelled nice and fresh. I think that the exfoliation level wasn't too harsh, which is good since you're using this every day twice a day. But I think I would have preferred the product if it wasn't a physical exfoliant and a chemical exfoilant, which can be over-stripping. I probably would have liked it more if it was just a chemical exfoliant. But it did leave my skin feeling smooth, and looking nice and bright.

reviews.review_title: Smells great and face feels amazing

The product is a brownish color and feels like soap. It smells great like a citrus scent. I massaged my face until it became a white foam and then rinsed with warm water. My face feels soft and looks great. I've used this product 4 days now and I can't wait to keep seeing more results. I definitely recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Would be amazing without the apricot microspheres!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Tata Harper to review and test. I absolutely loved the packaging and the citrus scent, but the apricot microspheres in the cleanser definitely make me pause to recommend this product wholeheartedly. The formula has BHAs in it, so it didn't need a  physical exfoliant in it as well which can cause microtears in the skin if used too frequently. I love the cleanser, but will be using it on my hands and feet much more often than I will on my face, specifically because of the apricot microspheres in the formula. Will definitely be reaching for this when I feel like there's a lot of buildup on my skin, but definitely won't be using this daily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

I love this Tata Harper Regenerating Exfoliating Cleanser.

I like that it didn't strip down my skin because it's an exfoliation product I minimize it to 3 times per week. So far it's been working great.

Wearing a mask has been so hard on my skin,  This gentle,  exfoliating cleanser has helped to remove the impurities from my skin.   I  love the fresh citrus scent and how it easily washes away.   I look forward to using this every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

After rinsing it off I apply a moisturizer and start my normal makeup routine. I really like the scent of the product itu2019s very refreshing and it leaves my facial skin feeling soft and clean looking. Itu2019s gentle enough to use everyday. It does not leave my skin dry like other exfoliating cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tata Harper regenerating cleanser experience is amazing. It is bottled in a beautiful moss green glass bottle with a pump dispenser. It's a light formula with teeny tiny exfoliating beads to help clean the gunk out of your pores. It has an amazingly relaxing citrus smell that makes you feel like your sitting on a beach. When using, you want to carefully scrub your face otherwise you can irritate your skin. It is made for daily use if you desire, though I'll be using it 2/3x a week. You come out on the other side with smooth, soft to the touch skin that smells like an orange. Yummy. This was gifted by Tata Harper in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser Daily Exfoliating Treatment for testing and review purposes. The first thing I noticed about the cleanser was the fresh clean citrusy scent that was splendid.  The cleanser is a light pink cream with an exfoliating texture. It left my skin looking clean and feeling smooth. After using other exfoliants my skin usually get very dry and feeling tight but it didnu2019t with Tata Harper. The cleanser was easy to apply and to remove. I massaged 2 pumps of the pink cleanser to my dry face and then I removed it with warm water after the cleanser turned white. It is a daily cleanser but I use it 3 times a week. I honestly really liked this cleanser.  - [ ]

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this cleanser it comes in a nice sturdy packaging with a pump that is quite convenient. Iu2019ve used it for over a week and I like it a lot. It has a nice citrus smell that reminds me of orange creamsicles and when I use the cleanser it leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. It says itu2019s supposed to be a daily exfoliating cleanser, but Iu2019m still wary of products that say this because J donu2019t want to over exfoliate. Iu2019ve used it daily and I donu2019t believe that itu2019s damaged my skin.However,  I have acne-prone skin and I felt like this cleanser didnu2019t help with my acne as much as I wouldu2019ve liked it to.( this was gifted to me by Tara Harper Skincare but these are all my honest opinions)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. This skin cleanser was amazing. My skin felt so soft and smooth after. It also smells so amazing and fresh. Definitely recommend and it will make such a great gift for all of your loves ones too! #ad

Since using this the greasy appearance has decreased tremendously, and I honestly feel like a different person. My acne has backed off some also.

It comes in a glass bottle that can be reused for other purposes (I plan to use it as a soap dispenser when done with the cleanser.) (Gifted by Tata Harper Skincare)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare in exchange for my honest review.  It seems that Iu2019m always looking for skincare products that are multipurpose,  but often have trouble finding them. This facial cleanser is wonderful and is definitely multipurpose! It cleans, exfoliates and softens all at once.  I only needed to use a small amount of the cleanser to feel like it had done itu2019s job. It is a beige color when it comes out of the bottle and turns white as you use it. The exfoliating part of it is very mild, but I could really feel it working.  It wasnu2019t rough or abrasive feeling, but it felt more like very fine grains of sand scrubbing my face. After I used it, my face felt clean and very soft. I am excited to continue using this product.

reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free gift for my honest opinion. Tata Harper Skincareu2019s Regenerating Cleanser is the best exfoliating cleanser Iu2019ve ever used! The microbeads within the creamy cleanser have single-handedly removed all dead skin from large, scaly patches on my chest. In addition, it has also made my face, chest, and back smoother and softer than they have been in a long time. The cleanser has a wonderful, citrus scent which is pleasant and not overpowering. The extremely clean ingredient list is much appreciated and means that I can use this product on my sensitive face. If you are thinking about purchasing this product, I highly recommend that you give it a try!
