reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser has the best of both worlds. It exfoliates the skin leaving it soft and smooth but isnt drying. After cleaning my skin, I can tell that the exfoliating properties does its job. My face always feels smooth but not dehydrated at all.   The bright citrus scent is not too strong, its very pleasant. If you dont like citrus, then you wont like this scent but if you dont mind fragrance in your skincare then it adds a luxury feel to the product. The fragrance doesnt smell fake either, it definitely has a natural smell.   The cleanser is a mid level exfoliant from my experience with other products, which is prefer. I want a product that actually exfoliates but isnt harsh like those products with walnut shavings.   Overall, this is a really nice product that I think normal to oily skin types would enjoy. However, the price point is a bit high for most people. I'm a skincare junkie so price is not as important to me as getting a good product.   I recieved this product complimentary from the brand.

reviews.review_text: @tatasharperskincare gifted me the Regenerating Cleanser, one of their best-sellers . This luxurious cleanser is a creamy, gentle daily exfoliator and my skin loves it .   Apricot microspheres provides the physical exfoliation to smooth texture, natural BHA from White Willow Bark Extract provides the chemical exfoliation, cleanse and clears the look of pores, Olive Oil Liquid Crystal Complex moisturizes and softens skin .   I have combo skin, I use it AM/PM and it leaves my skin fresh and brighter . With no dehydrating soap, detergents or sebum-stripping alcohol, this natural formula does not irritate my skin, itu2019s a great way to start and end the day. I love the beautiful glass bottle, the amazingly green smell & how soft and hydrated my skin feels. Have you tried Tata Harperu2019s products?

reviews.review_text: Gifted by Tata Harper Skincare  A cleanser & an exfoliator?  Count me in! Not only does this have non harmful surfactants, this also contains seed powders to help physically exfoliate while willow bark extracts have a chemical exfoliating benefit, due to their natural source of BHA.  This also has kaolin to help purify your skin.  I can use this two ways, as I would a regular cleanser ~ applying to my damp skin and washing my face with it OR for deeper exfoliation, apply to dry skin, massage gently and then rinse off  This has a wonderful  citrus herbal scent and it is a peachy-pink cleanser with the little bits of exfoliating powders as a texture.  This doesn't dry out my skin & my skin looks more clean  and bright while feeling soft & smooth. It is a gentle exfoliating cleanser and I would recommend it for oily and combo/oily skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product complimentary from Tata Harper Skincare. On first look this product seemed to live up to it's high cost. The dry application was something that I wasn't used to but didn't take away from the application. The product went on smooth and lathered pretty well. There was a light abrasiveness but not as much as you would find in a sugar or similar scrub. Overall after the first few days of application I am not overly impressed. For the higher price tag I was expecting my skin to feel better after use. My skin felt clean but slightly dry and coarse (which was suprising after reasing other reviews) It is not something I would probably purchase for myself but I will give it a few more days to see if it improves over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Tata Harper Skincare for my honest opinion and I am in love after first use.  I unfortunately have dull , combo skin type. It is hard to find products that work well at controlling oil, staying hydrated And that can brighten my skin. So this cleanser really is an all in one cleanser. My skin is awakened by the fresh citrus scent which is light and relaxing. The packaging is great and easily can be reusable. Includes a simple push dispenser The cleanser is thick so a little goes a long way. I like to gently and slowly build up a lather of the cleanser and it also washes away easily. Does Not feel greasy and did not break me out. I do not have sensitive skin but some cleansers break me out after first use.  I really have a radiant, clean glow after using this. Safely removes all makeup and impurities.My skin feels smooth and it helps create a great base for my makeup. I appreciate how this is completely natural and free from harmful ingredients. Feels super luxurious and made in small batches. I keep this in my mini skincare fridge to keep it extra fresh for each use. Always impressed by Tata Harper Skincare!

This Exfoliating Treatment that thoroughly cleanses and improves glow while purifying, minimizing the appearance of pores and helping to protect the skinu2019s natural hydration balance. Free of soaps, alcohols, and detergents, the cleanser clarifies the skin with fresh enzymes from, willow bark extract and citrus essential oils, while microspherical apricot seed powder polishes the skin and reduces the appearance of blackheads without stripping the skin of moisture. Skin is left feeling balanced, hydrated and glowing. 100% of the total ingredients are from natural origin. 80% of the total ingredients are from Organic Farming. Natural Cosmetic certified by Ecocert Greenlife according to Ecocert Standard.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received it first as a sample, which lasted for a few uses, and loved it so much that I ordered a full size (though the price tag makes to make me cry!). My skin is the worst possible combination type of dry, oliy, scarred, breakout-prone, and just everything at once - you name it. There are very, very few products that my skin will like and not break out from - and this exfoliating cleanser is one of them. Iu2019ve used many exfoliating cleansers before (both 100% organic and not-so-natural ones) and they were all either not cleansing enough or too harsh on my skin. This regenerating cleanser hits a sweet spot right in the middle, exactly where it should be. It cleans my skin deeply enough to leave it very clean and refreshed but it does so without harsh abrasiveness (the size of the micro-beads isnu2019t large enough to be abrasive to the skin) . It leaves my skin neither dry nor oily, but balanced just right. I use it 2-4 times a week before bedtime, followed by a moisturizer or serum that I know wonu2019t break me out. My skin looks a lot better and feels a lot softer and smoother right the next morning. I am now thinking of purchasing the companyu2019s sampler set of their other products; particulary interested in their moisturizers and serums. I also love the fact their ingredients are natural because it puts my mind at ease knowing Iu2019m not using dangerous / toxic chemicals on my skin. Maybe this is the major reason why the product works so well. Needless to say, I ditched all my other cleansers! But I just WISH the price tag wasnu2019t so high! :u2019u2019(

reviews.review_text: I have never written a review on Sephora however Iu2019ve been a customer for over a decade. Thatu2019s how good this stuff is. My skin is oily combo and no matter how hard I tried I just COULD NOT figure out what my skin wanted. Itu2019s congested and dull and textured and ugh I just couldnu2019t find what would work for me. On top of that I was spending a ton of money and time trying out different projects and methods to try and improve it. So I went out on a whim and bought the whole Tata Harper line to replace my current regimen. I purchased the regenerating cleanser, floral essence, resurfacing serum, and hyaluronic acid moisturizer. After first use I could tell my skin looked plumper. I made sure to take my time to really work the serum and moisturizer into my skin. When I awoke next morning I saw a HUGE difference in redness, brightness, and acne scarring. I was so surprised. This stuff is awesome. Doesnu2019t smell bad. Seriously just buy it. Iu2019m in love. Also be sure to read recommended use on the boxes, the facial wash is different you rub it into dry skin!

Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant about this cleanser with my acne-prone, combo skin, since it's a physical exfoliant.  However, I had samples that I used daily for about a month, and found that it was fairly gentle.  It seems to work well for me as a morning cleanser, to scrub away all those dead skin cells from overnight.  I try to keep the product on my face for at least 3 or 4 minutes, rubbing very gently with my fingertips and adding a bit of water as I go along to keep it from being abrasive.  When I rinse, my face looks so awake and bright and fresh!  Truly a difference over many other cleansers I've used.  It smells heavenly too, citrusy and warm, but not strong or overpowering.  And of course the packaging is lovely.  I just purchased a large size.

The scrub particles are very fine and don't disappear or melt - it feels so good and not overly abrasive. I've used the generous sample about 3x week for two weeks and now I cannot live without it. I hate how expensive it is but I love the clean ingredients and since I haven't found a dupe that comes close, I'll be purchasing this in full size.

reviews.review_text: This is by far the best cleanser I have ever tried. Its not your traditional cleanser and is not meant to remove heavy makeup. On slightly wet skin I apply a very thin layer and emulsify and leave on for about 3 minutes before I wash off. My skin feels so smooth after that I get excited about using it. It makes the rest of your skincare work so much better. I love using first thing in the morning because the scent is so light and refreshing. This is a game changer if you know how to use it properly. Also you need just the smallest amount for your entire face as its very concentrated.

reviews.review_title: My Favorite Cleanser, but das es-pensive
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have always bought the $42 travel size or the tiny pots that come with other sets. I finally splurged for the full size during the VIB Rouge sale. This product is expensive, but works great for my combination skin. I like to exfoliate daily to keep my skin clear and radiant. This cleanser and the Resurfacing Mask are my holy grail items. My skin feels amazingly smooth after daily use of cleanser and using the mask 2-3 times a week. I have noticed a major difference in my skin since starting using this regimen. Pores, greasiness and little hormonal breakouts or dietary breakouts on my chin or on my nose are my biggest concern. The breakouts go away quickly now. With consistent usage, I notice that my pores stay clearer longer which helps with the breakouts as well. I rarely need to use pore strips anymore and I would need to use them twice weekly to keep my pores clear previously. I can't say enough good things about this pricey product! After cleansing, I follow with a Vitamin C serum (Ole Henriksen or Tatcha), Caudalie Blemish Control Infusion serum (BHA), mineral fluid sunscreen and either Tatcha Water Cream or Kiehl's Cannabis Sativa Seed oil.

So for that reason, Iu2019ll continue to rebuy this cleanser even though itu2019s very pricey. Every time I wear makeup, I double cleanse. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing. I hate that it's so good, because it's pricey, but it smells amazing and leaves my skin so soft. I have issues with superficial dryness, and this has definitely helped alleviate that too. Will be buying again!

reviews.review_title: More of a balm than a cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells amazing and the packaging is very sweet but thatu2019s where my compliments end with this cleanser. It is extremely oily and left a film on my face that had to be washed off with another cleanser, it felt more balmy than a regenerative cleanser. I was thoroughly disappointed. Although i donu2019t have particularly oily skin as mine tends to be on the more drier side, I would not recommend this to those with more oily skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to hate this. Itu2019s ridiculously expensive and I purchased during the VIB sale. But I donu2019t hate it...quite the opposite. Iu2019m not saying you NEED this (does anyone need an $82 face wash?), and Iu2019m not saying it will work amazingly well for everyone. For me, I used the sample twice and was hooked. My skin feels smooth and glowy and has evened out texture-wise just after a few uses. I follow with Dr. Jart Ceramidin cream when my skin is extra dry and itu2019s perfect. I wish I didnu2019t have to buy this forever but I probably do!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells great, good consistency of grit to exfoliat and doesn't dry out skin.. Well worth the money!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Canu2019t say that I have seen a notable difference in my skin since using it (2 months now). If anything, it hasnu2019t caused my sensitive skin to react, however, at this outrageous price point, there are many other more affordable options that will likely do just as good of a job. I think it is a marketing scheme to price these products so high. Just because you pay more for something doesnu2019t mean that itu2019s more effective. I suggest choosing wisely and thinking twice about supporting a product line that isnu2019t trying to make good skincare accessible to a broader customer base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: That's a perfect match to resurfacing mask. And brand consultants recommend to blend it as well. Excited to try out all the rest of the line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a few samples of this cleanser and have tried it several times; at first I didnu2019t like how it left a slight residue on my face ( I rinsed very well) but it quickly resolved/absorbed which actually left my skin feeling a little softer. This cleanser of course doesnu2019t lather yet leaves your skin so clean. The exfoliant isnu2019t too harsh or gritty- I liked the texture. It does smell really good too!!! I feel like it cleanses so well, Iu2019m so close to buying the full size....also it can be used every day, so. I totally recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: New packaging makes a huge difference! This was my first refill since Tata updated the bottle and I've noticed a couple small changes: 1, I'm using the product faster, but 2, the top isn't getting clogged. The product itself is slightly thinner but still seems to work well. I think overall it evens out, I waste less product but I'm using more of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this with one of my Sephora orders, and I was blown away by it. This did an amazing job of cleansing and gently exfoliating my skin! I am 42 and have dry skin, and I can definitely say I felt a difference right after the first use. My skin texture felt evened out, and super soft. The grit of this is very fine, and I really enjoyed the citrus scent is has. This cleanser isn't cheap, but I feel like a little goes a long way and the efficacy is impressive. This is definitely going on my shortlist as a product to buy in full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this cleanser, it feels like such a luxe treat. But beyond that, it really does leave my skin soft and it does a nice job at exfoliating gently, which allows my serums/moisturizers to better absorb. I just stopped using it for a few weeks because I didn't want to spend the money again (Tata products are definitely expensive) but I have noticed my skin has been feeling much drier and looking dull without this in my routine so I had to rebuy! Highly recommend as an everyday cleanser.

reviews.review_title: Not going to lie: Best cleanser ever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a complete skincare junkie and I have tried every cleanser at Sephora probably (this is not an exaggeration)   This is truly the best cleanser ever. I have extremely sensitive skin and it's very gentle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I havenu2019t been getting enough sleep this whole week so my skin looked dull. After just one use, my face was glowing the next day. I looked like Iu2019m not running on 4 hours of sleep, with no makeup on top of that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this when I bought my clarifying mask for Tata Harper, and I fell in love with it. It was enough for two washes but I was pleasantly surprised on how well it cleansed my skin and it smells so good! I started using Lancer method cleanse but I noticed that it stripped my skin of Any moisture I could have had. After Tata Harper my skin still felt soft and it dissolved all of my makeup on my skin. I just bought the body oil and balm from Tata Harper website, but I plan on using their products more because I love how all the ingredients are natural. If you go to Tatau2019s website you can type in the number on the bottom of the box or jar and find out when the batch was made.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cleanser. the perfect amount of exfoliation for everyday use. just after the first use my skin was baby skin soft and looked so youthful

reviews.review_title: Fell in love with this product! (But v expensive)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried this out in the Sephora Favorites Clean Beauty Kit, and I absolutely fell in love. It's easy and gentle to use, and it smells amazing! Best of all, I see a visible glow after I use it - my skin feels soft, moisturized, and healthy, and it looks great!   However, it is quite pricey, so I don't know if I will keep buying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I picked up a mini of this product and Iu2019m so glad I tried it. It smells amazing and I look forward to using it in the morning. It is gentle but effective at removing dry skin, deep cleaning pores, and makes my skin glow. The ingredients are natural and donu2019t irritate my sensitive skin. The price is high but for the quality and how long the product lasts, itu2019s not a terrible value. I do want to purchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice product! I have oil and combination skin, and this product can clean skin nicely.

reviews.review_title: Reduces large pores, very light exfoliation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 32 and suffer from acne with combination skin with large pores. I have tried just about everything and I'm honestly tired of spending money at this point. I decided to give this line a try and OMG. I am so glad I found Tata Harper's line, I think this may be one of the first facial exfoliator cleansers I actually repurchase! The smell doesn't bother me, it smells like I'm at the spa and it's beautiful. I use this in the morning after the purifying cleanser does what it says--gives me that glow! My face has really cleared up in about 2 weeks and I have purchased a few other Tata Harper products because I love it so much. If you are the same as me...try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great morning cleanser

reviews.review_title: Feels great, but doesnu2019t remove makeup well.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Feels great on the skin, but doesnu2019t perform great when it comes to removing even some light makeup.  Has to be combined with a first cleanser but then applied to dry skin if you are going to folllow the instructions. For this price I want the performance of 2 in 1 cleanser to remove my makeup and to  nourish my skin all in one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser has a lovely consistency, very gentle exfoliant and slightly sweet/citrusy scent. I got it as part of a clean beauty variety pack and have pretty much used it up now. Definitely a luxury purchase, though. I have used other cleansers I also liked that are less pricey. But this made me feel like the rich lady I wish I were on my Sunday spa nights!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample initally and loved. bought the smaller full size. the allure has worn off. other products help keep my complexion clear and bright. would prefer other packaging to help keep the product from coming out too much also.

reviews.review_title: Best exfoliating cleanser I ever tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I only used it twice so far and it already made my skin feel so good and soft. I got it as a sample with one of my purchases, but Iu2019m definitely going to buy the full size because itu2019s feels great on my skin,  it smells amazing and Iu2019m sure Iu2019m going to see some great long term results

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I had no clue Iu2019d love this cleanser so much! It somehow soothes and exfoliates and nourishes all at the same time. The scent is like a flower garden - i massage it in and itu2019s a full-on aromatherapy session, yet doesnu2019t ittirate my eyes at all. Highly reccomened this as the second step in a luxurious double cleanse. Will re-purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser. I really liked it. the price not so much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Recently I bought the tata harper resurfacing mask (which is awesome) and I received a small sample of this in the packaging.. said to apply this cleanser first on dry skin, and add the mask on top, leave for 15 mins. I have really sensitive and acne prone skin, and I am pleasantly surprised this did not irritate my skin at all! In fact, I think it even helped even out my redness and my face was left sooooo smooth! I woke up with less visible scars and this was only after ONE use. I am hooked. Just wish her line wasnu2019t so expensive, but Itu2019s worth the splurge because I canu2019t remember when I last saw my face this clear.

reviews.review_title: I didnu2019t want to love it...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: But, I do! I was trying to avoid the product because of the price. But, I ended up trying it during my Perk Hydration Facial at Sephora. Itu2019s what Iu2019ve been looking for! Iu2019ve been searching for a cleanser that is gentle enough for my sensitive skin, but strong enough to help with my dry, flakey skin especially on my cheeks, around my mouth. Iu2019ve been using it for a week and Iu2019ve seen great improvement. I like the scrubby feeling and I get that from the apricot powder. No need to scrub your face off. Just massage your face in gentle, circular motions. Oh, and the grapefruit scent is delightful and uplifting! The product is also 100% natural and 82% of the total ingredients are from organic farming. How amazing is that?! Yes, itu2019s a high price tag, but Iu2019m happy to support a company that makes clean, natural, farm-to-face products. Go to Sephora and get a sample! Everyone is different, so itu2019s the only way to ensure itu2019s right for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a gift set and took it along on an overnight stay. My cheeks and jawline were immediately irritated, and my face was red and blotchy the next day. Three days later, my skin is still scaly. Thereu2019s something in here thatu2019s definitely not for me! Itu2019s supposed to be safe for sensitive skin, and my skin isnu2019t even that sensitive.

reviews.review_title: BEST CLEANSER FOR SENSITIVE COMBINATION SKIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the only cleanser that works for my combo skin, maybe its just in my head but it gentle and doesn't strip my skin of its natural oils like most of the cleansers do

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and I used it a few times. I could not believe the glow it gave my skin immediately after cleansing. The apricot scent also smells so good! I would give the product five stars for effectiveness but this pretty pricey. However, if you're looking for something to really give your skin a healthy glow, you may just be willing to overlook the high price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I received a sample once and was amazed with how soft my skin felt afterwards. But after giving it a try for a couple of weeks now, I haven't noticed any significant difference in my skin at all, it just always leaves it feeling super clean. I wouldn't recommend using daily though because it is an exfoliator and it can be too harsh for the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using a trial size of this cleanser for a couple of weeks now and had to go out to buy the full size product. I love the texture, subtle aroma, and gentle exfoliation of this cleanser. It doesn't irritate my sensitive skin and I'm totally hooked on the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite cleansers. I use it every morning. I have sensitive skin and does not cause any breakouts.  It leaves my skin feeling refreshed and awake! It also smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper is a line I use numerous products in because they work!  I have experienced immediate, continuous results.  This product works well without any ill effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cleanser.  Removes all my makeup and love the exfoliant.  I have very dry, sensitive skin (and live in a very dry climate) and this product does not leave my skin dry or tight.  My skin is fresh, clean and soft.  Will definitely be a staple product for me in my skin regimen.

reviews.review_title: More of a scrub than a daily cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love Tata Harper projects but this one is worth skipping. I don't consider it a cleanser it is more of a scrub with the apricot seed powder, I don't use physical exfoliants anymore so I was not happy when i realized the texture of the product. It neither cleansed nor really brightened total bummer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin, so finding a good exfoliating wash can be difficult. This one was gentle enough for me that my skin wasnu2019t irritated, but I am not sure how much it actually did for me. It was ok - if it was less expensive I think I would def purchase again but at this price point Iu2019m undecided.

reviews.review_title: Would recommend to those with a lenient budget
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wish I could give 3.5 stars, but I will give 3 for a few reasons... first, the cost. However, the quality of the ingredients paired with the cruelty-free production and ethical standards of the company do qualify it to be a higher priced product in my book. Since company is so high end, the pump should be better (I know Iu2019m not the only one who experienced this issue)... third, you must moisturize afterward. Iu2019m currently debating my moisturizer and I would try Tatau2019s since I like the company except I refuse to pay upwards of $100 for the tiny bottle (sorry, I know itu2019s high end, but thatu2019s bonkers). I will say, one bottle does last me 6 months which comes out to less than $15 a month which is decent. Overall, a great product if you can afford it, but if youu2019re ballin on a budget, probably not for you. (And please fix the pump design, Tata!!!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and itu2019s really incredible! It smells so nice and after one use my skin is smooth and dewy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a pack of products by Tata Harper and instantly fell in love after just two uses and added it into my weekly regimen...This is a great gentle exfoliator, probably one of the best Iu2019ve ever used. I have combination skin thatu2019s on the sensitive side. I use this every other day and also use the resurfacing mask after as well. My skin GLOWS after the combination of these two...Let me also say that this is the hands down best smelling skin care product Iu2019ve ever used! It smells like some sort of citrus fruit, I absolutely love it.

reviews.review_title: when scent is the main plus
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: received this product as a sample. I do love citrus scents, that's why this mild mandarin one was very lovely, but the cleanser itself doesn't make its work quite good - after applying my face is not squeaky, so I have to apply it once again and even after I don't feel that freshness that i'm used to. And for sure price for such a mediocre product is too high. Nice scent doesn't help.

reviews.review_title: Surprisingly good, but get the pump bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've taken good care of my skin for quite some time, so nothing usually makes a drastic difference or really, significantly impresses me. This did. I put it on my face dry, Rub it on until it feels done, when you try you'll feel what I mean, then slowly start to add fingertips of water until it's lathered up, then rinse it off with a washcloth. My face comes out feeling like I've had a facial. Every day. I was very surprised how much of a difference it's made. One suggestion. Get the pump. The tube makes it easy to use way too much and the pump dispenses the perfect amount. And this stuff is too expensive to waste it, so in the long run the pump will save you money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the light exfoliation this product provides. It has helped with my acne as well. This cleanser has a very nice scent as well. I feel like my skin glows after using this cleanser! My only complaint is that I feel that the product is overpriced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is now my favorite daily cleanser! You actually see results quickly AND for me at least, it helped after first use to make my face super smooth and soft! Itu2019s nice and citrusy smelling instead of like chemicals. My only complaint is that itu2019s a bit pricey compared to my normal go tou2019s. Super glad I tried this as a sample first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the natural, fresh ingredients but didn't find the product to be a gamechanger for its price. Would accept as a sample but probably will not purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE IT! i got a sample of this cleanser, and itu2019s amazing. it leaves your skin feel so soft and hydrating. ten out of ten recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't understand this one at all. I followed the directions and used it on dry skin...it actually hurt! It dried up on the skin very quickly and became impossible to keep rubbing. I had to add more, but I could still see make up on my face. It left a filmy feeling on my skin even after repeated rinsing. This is definitely exfoliating, but too harsh for me and lousy at actually cleansing. Glad I tried a sample instead of buying this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an excellent cleanser. I have large pores I'm trying to get rid of and if I had more of this I'm confident it would help minimize them, although I don't know about disappearing altogether. It smells nice, the exfoliation isn't too scratchy but I would still switch it up occasionally to give my skin a break from the physical exfoliation aspect of it (a gel cleanser or something). It didn't dry out my skin, just left it soft and smooth and clean but not tight. Highly recommend at least getting a sample of this. Kinda pricey but if you can swing it then I think it's worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: AMAZING.. I love this exfoliating cleanser. I have dry sensitive skin and I've used it twice. Already I have noticed such a significant difference to the texture and Glowy-ness of my face. definitely worth it. Great smell too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m new to trying out the Tata line but I was quite impressed with this cleanser. I definitely noticed a difference after the first use and my skin just looked refreshed and smoother. In fact, the make up artist that I normally see asked if I was doing anything different because my skin looked really good. I definitely want to try other products from the Tata Harper line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing results with consistent use.  I have dry skin and get dry patches with flakes and red bumps that donu2019t have pus or a head of any kind.  I was worried it would be too drying but it has cleared the bumps and dry patches.  Now my serums and moisturizer can work waaay better. And Iu2019m glowing. I have been using for three weeks every day am/pm.   I also use the Purifying Cleanser from Tata. The only draw back is that it works best on dry skin so you canu2019t go from first oil cleanse straight to this cleanser.  Got to pat your skin dry and then use this. Worth it!

reviews.review_title: Best exfoliating product on the market!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This super gentle, yet powerful and effective exfoliator is the best on the market.  All natural, very refreshing, and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin.  I recommend this product to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata harper is the most expensive brand. I got the $42 version of this cleanser because I had a sample and it was so great, so i bought the cheaper full size, but it's so small! The product is great though, just beware that the size might disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample and canu2019t wait to order the actual cleanser. It smells great and I really felt it cleaning my face! Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the smell of this cleanser. it was so clean and fruity smelling. It was a great at exfoliating and could easily be used regularly. My skin was so soft after using it. I received a free sample for it so I was a bit shocked at the price when I looked at buying it. It's expensive so I may have to hold off on purchasing it regularly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great exfoliador! i love the apricot seed powder. it reminds me of a drug store apricot scrub but no where near as harsh on the skin. itu2019s super gentle and not drying at all. it tightens your pores but your skin doesnu2019t feel dry nor too tight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually do like this cleanser but I have to take off stars for affordability. For the price, you should get at least twice as much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great smell, exfoliation, left my skin very soft

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful, highly effective cleanser. It is 100% natural so you donu2019t have to worry about sketchy chemicals or artificial fragrances. It is also perfect for most (all?) skin types. This pick is actually an exfoliant, but is gentle enough to use daily. It is chock-full of amazing, organic goodness and leaves skin seriously radiant. Apply to dry or damp skin in circular motions and voila! After rinsing, skin is hydrated, balanced, glowing and just plain happy. It also reduces the appearance of pores. Plus, it is insanely refreshing and smells fantastic. Use this regularly for one week and you will never look back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a tiny sample of this but have been able to use it about 4 times.  Itu2019s really awesome for cleaning out those smaller clogged pores.  It makes my skin look super clear and bright.  I will be buying a tube of this for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Don't be mislead by the How to Use instructions. You actually need to add water to emulsify this cleanser.  It takes about a pump and a half for my face and neck.  I absolutely love the smell of this exfoliating cleanser. It is light, fruity, and refreshing.  It really deep cleans and leaves my skin glowing.  I am absolutely in love with this cleanser.  You start by rubbing the cleanser onto your dry face. Then after you can't rub anymore, wet your hands with warm water, then emulsify the cleanser and continue to cleanse.  At first I just felt like I was doing it wrong so I thought I would clarify this for anyone else trying this cleanser.  I love it. It has really improved the texture of my skin and I feel like after using it my pores have become smaller and the texture of the surface of my skin has become softer. I love the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser and I will repurchase this cleanser when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: received as a sample and loved it immediately.  softest my skin has felt in a while and the exfoliation isn't too harsh for me to use everyday on my sensitive skin. I bought the large bottle and I'm loving it.  also has a nice scent it reminds me of st ives apricot scrub (except that brand makes me break out) . on a side note I did like that this brand is natural. although it was a bit more expensive than I would like to pay for a cleanser it was definitely worth it to find a cleanser that makes my skin feel so healthy

reviews.review_title: Great! Not for every day or use with clarisonic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and really liked it. I generally like the Tara Harper products I've received samples of but have never purchased one before. This would have changed that if it wasn't sold out (I am waiting for that email alert to let me know it's back! Come on sephora!)   This smells nice, like a natural product (think Aveda). It has small exfoliating granuals in it but still manages to be somewhat gentile. This is magic on my dried out winter skin, when my daily chemical exfoliating pads just aren't enough - though I would be weary to use this every day. Because of the sand like exfoliators I could see this irritating skin of used every day. And definitely do not use with your clarisonic or other cleansing devices. Hands only!   This is def worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is gross ... leaves my face not feeling clean and bike out my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect exfoliator, especially now the packaging allows you to get every last bit of it, compared with the green bottle. Use on your neck and decolletage to keep wattles and wrinkles at bay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample because the full size is VERY expensive. Iu2019m so pleased with this cleanser it makes me unhappy that it is so expensive. After one use it got rid of unnecessary oils and my face is incredibly soft. The exfoliant isnu2019t too harsh and would be perfect for using three or four times a week. It leaves your skin feeling very balanced: not too dry and not too oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money.  I have no problem spending $$$$ but this one is definitely not worth it.    I saw no improvement in my skin and does not clean off make-up very well.  Didn't even last a month using 2x per day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the way this made my skin feel. i have sensitive skin, so I'm always concerned about ingredients. I received a sample, so I wish that the sample would allow one to sample it more than once, as my skin can take says to react to a new product. But fir a first time use, I absolute loved howw smooth my skin felt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is amazing and made my skin feel soft right after using, but this definitely is not for sensitive skin. I broke out in red patches all over my face and neck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE. Left my face feeling so fresh and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample, which I really liked. My skin definitely looked brighter and more even after one use. I may buy this in be future when I am not so well stocked on cleanser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Meh. Smells good, but that's about it. Otherwise nothing special. I will say that I don't know if it was this product or the Tatcha cleansing oil (maybe the both of them), but I have broken out twice since trying out that regimen...so I won't be repurchasing. Not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked how this product has exfoliators in it, It felt nice on my skin. However, it did not remove my makeup. Which is a huge turn off for me because some nights Iu2019m too lazy to do too many steps. I wouldnu2019t purchase this simply for that fact.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cleanser!  It has exfoliating beads to scrub well and smells incredible!  It makes my skin glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample & didn't see results.  It's a very mild exfoliant & didn't seem to work.  The grains (don't remember what they were) were extremely fine & scarce, so I gently massaged my face longer than I normally would, but just nothing happened.  I like that it's gentle, but it may be a little too gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser. The gentle exfoliation has made a MAJOR difference in my skin and I love how it feels. I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_title: END ALL BE ALL OF CLEANSERS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best daily exfoliator I have used. I enjoy using this in the morning. My combo skin really loves this! There is no drying out of my skin, it feels smooth and I noticed a brightening effect right away. Amazing formula with great natural ingredients and the smell is delicious. The only exfoliator I will be buying from here on out. Worth every penny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am using a sample size I bought from another kit

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing!  It has enough texture that I haven't needed to use a separate scrub.  I have issues with flaky skin and redness - This has improved both.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! I got a free sample and then had to get the full size. It smells citrusy and lovely. The gritty texture might throw you at first but it really works to scrub and exfoliate. My skin feels SO soft after using this. I recommend using it two or three times a week even though it says you can use it every day, but it does have three different types of alcohol in it although they are low toxicity, I like to be careful because I have sensitive skin. Also recommend leaving it on for 30 seconds before you rinse to let it soak in a little.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I HIGHLY recommend this kit! Like HIGHLY!!! This is a great kit. And believe me when I say a little goes a long way. I first started out with a sample of the mask. Absolutely LOVED it! So I thought well I want to get the full size, then I saw this kit was only $2 more and it has the full size. At first you think THIS is the size?! But you serious do not need a lot! So not only does it feel amazing on your skin, but I have VERY sensitive skin and it does not irritate it whatsoever. I havenu2019t had a product I was this happy with in a while. There were dramatic results for me overnight! A little story about my sensitive skin for you - this past weekend my mom got a new laundry detergent and when she hugged me I could tell it was different. That very day my face started breaking out. I had about 20 teeny tiny zits on my cheeks. Made my cheeks extremely red. I got the kit on Monday, by the way, Monday morning I woke up and my face was so red it looked like I just put blush all over my cheeks. So that night I got home from work, washed my face, put the mast on, cleaned it off then used the moisturizer. Tuesday - Not only did I only have THREE zits but ALL the redness was gone. This has been like a miracle kit for my sensitive skin! It feels great, it doesnu2019t burn, and the mask doesnu2019t get so hard it hurts your face. I definitely recommend this to someone with highly sensitive skin. I donu2019t know if itu2019s supposed to help with breakouts too but it definitely worked for that too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using it for less than a month and until now I feel it has given a good change in my face, although I do not know if I justify the price, I'll wait a little longer to decide

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It helps remove any layer of dead skin and my skin is left feeling very smooth. I love this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this exfoliator!! It's gentle enough to use daily & best of all it does not dry you out. I've tried sooo many exfoliators & this is by far one of my favorites. It's has a nice citrus scent, smells fresh & clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this in a sephora favorites kit and I found this to be great on sensitive skin- it smells a nice fruity scent and I am also sensitive to perfume products. It really feels like it's polishing because the grains seem even smaller than sand grains - similar to a micro polishing! When it's rinsed of the skin feels like there's a slight numbness, as there seems to be a balm that's left on your face. Really feels great and got rid of white heads on my face. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love it!! I am pregnant and was worry about which cleanser would be good, and don't get blotches, and looking something for aging at the same time, and this baby was made for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was worried this would be too rough for my delicate, mature skin--boy, was I wrong! This stuff just makes me glow! I've only used it for a week, and sometimes with a double cleanse with oil--I am glowing! I have rosacea, and it didn't bother it at all! I'm hoping in time I will see even more benefits! One thing--don't rub it in too hard or for too long--just enough to make it change to slightly foamy. I don't notice a scent, which is nice, as I have been bothered by Tata Harper fragrance in the past, as I'm very fragrance sensitive. I will definitely buy this again!

I tried a sample of this product that came in a Sephora favorites set and I love the scent as well as texture! The scent is citrusy without being overpowering and the entire provides the perfect amount of physical exfoliation. It leaves your skin smooth without stripping my dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am super oily ..as in shiny all over within 2-5 minutes of cleansing my face oily. I'm not breakout prone but am prone to both texture and redness. since using this cleanser, I've noticed a dramatic improvement in my texture and absolutely love the smell! I use this as my morning cleanser.

This cleanser rescued my skin!!  I had small bumps kinda under my skin and I could never get rid of them. I tried this and my face has never been clearer.  The smell is awesome. Beautiful packaging. I can't go without it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cleanser itself is fantastic, exfoliates and brightens my skin. The pump on my bottle is unusable though. I have to take it out each time and dump it out. They've changed the packaging since I made the purchase (thank goodness)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser its the only one with exfoliating particles I will use on my face, its amazing and it has a citrus scent.  Howerver I will one use if I get samples of this, I don't spend more than $40 on cleanser as a personal rule. If you can spend you money on it go for it!!
Absolutely love this cleanser! Leaves my skin looking and feeling fresh

This product is COMPLETELY worth the money!! Not only does it smell absolutely amazing, it makes your skin feel clear, smooth, and refreshed! This is definitely my new favorite cleanser that I will use from now on!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is WORTH THE MONEY!! it exfoliates physically and chemically (both incredibly gentle, so no micro-tears in the skin or skin irritation) and works wonders on acne, pores and fine lines. This truly does it ALL.  I have definitely been noticing a difference in my skin in the past few weeks. I use this after taking off my make up with the Boscia Makeup Breakup Cleansing Oil. The Tata cleanser really helps to get off all of the dirt and pollution from the day, and soften the skin to get it ready for other products.   Some people have complained about the pump/nozzle. I however, think it's right for this cleanser. You want to apply this dry, and you really don't need more than 3 or 4 pumps as it spreads well. Plus, at $78, do you really want it to pump out a huge gob where you don't even need that much?  Pro tip: use this layered under the resurfacing mask!

reviews.review_title: Great results, but not for daily use...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used a foil sample of this up, and really, really liked this cleanser. I would consider purchasing the full size, however, for the simple reason that this cleanser has grains of stuff in it, it becomes a product that I would use no more than once or twice a week.   If TH decides to remove the grains, I'd be all over this product - it makes my skin soft, smooth and with that ethereal glow after cleansing. I would seriously replace one of my current cleansers with this instead. The scent is pleasant and I don't see any red flags in the ingredient list (besides a couple of potentially irritating oils--but my skin is not sensitive). No harsh surfactants, no foamy lather but still gets the job done. It's a great second step cleanser after using a balm to remove makeup. You also only need a tiny bit of product to clean the entire face. The foil sample lasted me 5 uses, and I was generous with the amount I applied.  Unfortunately, the grains are a deal breaker for me. I've moved away from physical exfoliation as it could damage or irritate skin, and I rely on chemical exfoliation instead. I would most likely end up using this like a treatment rather than a daily cleanser. And I already have a very good arsenal of masks and treatments, plus a good rotation of 2-3 cleansers, so this product, while effective for my skin, simply doesn't have a place in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first thought this brand was just for packaging.. but man I am sold! You use the littlest product and it really makes your face brighten.

I received this product in a sample box and OMG!! Amazing. The smell is absolutely intoxicating.... it's probably one of my favorite scents now. The grit is extremely fine and I have sensitive skin and I was fine.  You will not be disappointed. I have spent an embarrassing amount of money on skincare from Sephora and this one is my #1!!

reviews.review_title: Feels great but didn't notice improvement....
reviews.review_text: Tata Harper is one of those brands I like and order a ton of products only to find, just like all the other skin care products I've tried, it doesn't work. Everything promises smaller pores and smooth skin. I thought this would be the answer to all my skin problems. I have used this probably two months now and my skin looks exactly the same. Still have a lot of breakouts, big pores, and uneven skin tone. As much as I love Harper's all natural approach and how the products feel, I can't recommend since I haven't noticed any results. Save your money.

Really wanted to hate this because of the price, but i fell in love with it. Love this cleanser and works miracles for my unpredictable skin. Especially amazing when paired with the moisturizer and resurfacing mask. Can't use any other cleansers anymore because of how great and natural this is. My skin will react to any other cleanser that isn't as clean as tata harpers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Recently bought this cleanser on a whim because I heard such great things about this brand. My skin is combination with more of a tendency to get dry. The beads in this cleanser are not the best for daily use (although it does say twice a day on the packaging). The smell is nice and it definitely produces a soft complexion but I would not recommend this product.. the price and quality is rather mediocre in comparisons to other affordable alternatives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have really acne prone skin and can have bad hormonal breakouts and cystic acne. After a particularly bad breakout, I was trying some different cleansers and acne treatments but all they seemed to be doing was drying out my skin and causing more problems. I decided to completely switch to Tata Harper as a more natural solution. I used the Regenerating Cleanser in addition with the Clarifying Cleanser. It took a couple of weeks for my skin to rebalance and heal, but it really worked. Now my skin is clear and soft and i don't have that tight, dry feeling after i wash my face which is typical  with acne medicated cleansers. It's expensive but well worth the price, in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the cleanser and it smells like heaven! I also liked the glass bottle. However, the pump mechanism is horrible. Really horrible. I had to pump it 20-30 times to get a pea-size amount of the product. Taking the pump off and trying to get it out that was also took too long and was annoying. For the price, I expect a more thoughtful packaging system. I threw the bottle away before it was fully empty because I couldn't get anymore product out.

Received a sample and loved it. Left my skin feeling amazing. I noticed a difference after just using the sample 3 times. A little goes a long way. I have dry, acne-prone skin. Hoping this will help with old scars :)

reviews.review_title: Best Cleanser I Have Ever Tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, I have actually tried so many different cleansers that I've lost count. I thought I had finally found one that I liked until I received a sample of this... and I HATE that I love it so much because it's so expensive. I don't care for the smell, but I'm willing to put up with it because it makes my skin feel so soft and NEW, that's the only way I can describe it. I also suffer from adult acne, and this seemed to help. But I can't fully be sure until I use it long term. I will be buying the full size product.   One thing though: if you have sensitive skin, try a sample of this first. It made my skin feel very tingly when I used it and at first I thought I was having a reaction to it...
I received a sample of this in my previous package and it smells amazing !!! Like froot loops !! Its the best cleanser ever !!<3 highly recommend!!!:)
Love this product. I love the smell, and true texture is perfect. The only bummer is I got one with a defective pump. So I have to unscrew it every time I want to use it. But it's still great.
Se produit est tru00e8s bon, il polis la peau et enlu00e8ve tout les impuretu00e9s. J'ai la peau grasse et tout ma peau est tru00e8s popre je laisse le produit une minute sur la peau avant d'enlever

Love this cleanser! The smell alone will wake you up in the mornings and it doesn't dry my skin out. Those looking for an intense scrubbing action won't find it in this, it's very gentle. Besides the price, my only complaint is the pump. It's horrible! I literally have to pump it 20 times to get a pea size amount. So irritating for this price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i got a sample of this and loved it , got the large bottle and was super happy with it at first about 15% of the way thru the bottle got clogged up and wont unclogg , the only way to use it is to unscrew it and dump it out onto my hands , i dont want to have to do that with an 80 $ face cleanser it wastes more then id like .

reviews.review_title: not for me, but I want to give this brand a chance
reviews.review_text: It didn't suit me... I have combination skin: an oily nose and normal-dry everywhere else. This made my nose feel like it didn't get clean and it made my forehead and cheeks sooo so dry.  It smells amazing. I love that it's made in Vermont and I love that it has natural ingredients. I want to support this brand. I hope it works for other people with different skin types.

This stuff really works. It smells sooooo good and my skin truly looks and feels healthy after using this. It took about a week to start noticing the benefits, but that's still not a long time. I use about 5-7 pumps (only a little comes out at a time) on DRY skin. Does not leave me with any tight or uncomfortable feeling. I use it morning and night. I have normal/dry skin. I love to know this product is filled with great ingredients, is good for my skin, smells good and actually makes your skin look smoother and healthier. I love it! Highly recommend! Works better on dry skin in my opinion. They do recommend to use it on dry skin. What I do is after I use it, I leave the product on my dry face and get my clarisonic wet and then use that too. 2 whammies. Using it on dry skin to really exfoliate, but then I get to use my clairsonic too for a deeper clean.
I love this stuff! (Wish the price point wasn't so high, but it is great!) leaves my skin nice and soft, gently resurfaced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of the most critical steps to maintain a good, healthy looking, moisturized, young looking skin is to have a good cleansing/exfoliating system in place. Cell turn over slows down as we age, and the single way to speed this process up is the usage of AHA, BHA, enzymes and retinoids. All these guys remove layers of dead cells sitting on top of our skin (we have over 30 layers of dead cells!), so newer Cells can show up sooner. An effective cleanser will allow the serums and mosturizers to really penetrate into the skin, plumping and repairing it. Unfortunatelly most exfoliators damage and dry up your skin, so you have to be dilligent and do your research when picking up a good exfoliator. Avoiding plastic bids is crucial here.  So...you need to find products that are effective but also  kind on your skin.  Now, you want a gentle daily exfoliator, and also a stronger weekly mechanical exfoliator, to maintain a good system.  Having said all that, I firmly believe that this is, in my opinion, one of the best products in the market to maintain a radiant, younger looking skin. This product is absolutely outstanding. Gentle yet effectively will remove a good amount of debris every morning, guaranteeing that the rest of your skincare penetrates deeply into your Skin. Wont make your skin feel dry, tense or uncomfortable. The cocktail of ingredients is just perfect. Apricot seeds, pink clay, willow bark and others are just the right combo to do the job. The use of this product will shrink your pores and make your skin glow and feel comfortable, even if you are using retinoids. I typically use it over dry skin , every morning, and follow up with my Tatcha plumping Essence. The result? Gorgeous soft skin that keep getting compliments.  As a collateral... I have cut in half the amount of foundation I need.  Fantastic product. Im so glad that they listened and change the package. The squeezy tube is just perfect to deliver this product.  A must.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The key to success with this product is using dry skin and hands to apply. It works if you skin is wet but you get the deeper clean with dry skin. It smells pretty good and the packaging is pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good exfoliating cleanser that did clean out the pores somewhat.  I found that I couldn't use it every day.  I use it 1-2x a week.  Honestly I never repurchased it again because there are better products out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the smell of this product and how it leaves a refresh and clean feeling. However, I absolutely hate the packaging especially for the 50ml bottle. I don't know if it's because of the texture of the product or something else, the pump is terrible and I have to press it like 20 times to get the amount of product I want.
I really like this for my sensitive skin! A bit pricey so I don't use everyday but once a week is good with my routine.

I just got today. I was debating to get it due to the price point. But I am suffered from dry dehydrated skin (winter) as well as breakout on my chin, which I suspect because I do not wash my face clean enough. I use it today for the first time, I can definetly can see what kind of softness what other review talking about. My skin felt like exactly regenerate. Love it so much my flaky patches just vanished straight away. If u are in doubt, get it! I am sure u won't regret
Bought it today and love the softness it leaves after I wash it off.
I have oily, acne prone skin. My skin texture/tone is nicer and more clear within a couple days of using this. Smells great, awesome company, expensive...but worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the citrusy smell of this cleanser. It made my face feel fresh after using it. I didn't notice any difference using this product compared to others that I use.
Not a fan of the smell but I love this cleanser, it's perfect for sensitive skin and it leaves your skin feeling amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have had three bottles of this product. In between has tried various sample more expensive and less expensive product. Still find this the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have super sensitive skin, but this cleanser doesn't irritate at all.  Leaves skin feeling super clean and refreshed.  Scent is also pleasant.  Would absolutely recommend!

reviews.review_title: Love the product, hate the pump
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing. Although it says is gentle enough to use daily, I like to use only twice a week as a treatment. I love the formulation but the pump sucks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a soothing cleanser. There aren't many exfoliating beads in it so it's gentle for sensitive skin too.  Other reviewers who said their skin was raw, scrubbed much too hard. Any exfoliatior shouldn't be scrubbed hard on the skin. This will only damage your skin. This cleanser is meant to be used gently and when used properly, it leaves the skin feeling clean, plumped, nourished.  Don't scrub, simply massage into the skin. There is definitely an overall improvement in skin tone and texture after use.  I use this in the shower every other day and my skin always feel so soft and pampered after. The smell is amazing and how wonderful that it's all natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Glad product suits some other reviewers, sensitive skin BEWARE. Too harsh, created problems, better resurfacing available, and DAILY? No way, this type of treatment isn't suited for frequent use. SAMPLE this before buying it. My 2 stars are for the delightful packaging and frngrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this exfoliator. Here's my list of pros and cons  PROS 1. gentle yet effective. Never left my face feeling raw 2. skin felt smooth after use 3. pores looked smaller bc they were decongested 4. love the fruity smell 5. combo it with the resurfacing mask and it left my skin looking radiant  CON  1. So expensive

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think my biggest issue with this is the exfoliating beads. I've used it once, and in the two days since have had *very* sensitive/dry patches of skin to either side of my nose. I could feel when I was cleansing that it was a deep clean, but it wasn't until the next day that I realized how raw my skin was. Would NOT recommend for everyday if your skin is irritated by physical exfoliation. I usually use St Ive's 1-2x a week, so my skin is sued to exfoliation, but this rubbed me the wrong way (pun intended). I have a sample that I got from a gift package from Sephora, am thinking I will throw the rest of it away because I don't want to make my skin worse. I will say it scrubbed away the breakouts I could see forming, but not worth reusing and risking my skin for.

This cleanser was recommended as a daily cleanser, and I was incredibly disappointed with it for that purpose. The exfoliation was much too rough for daily use with my dry, sensitive skin. Would have been better if I needed a twice/week exfoliant. This product also has a VERY strong fruity scent, which I did not like. I returned this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very heavily scented. The product inside is OK, although the pump needs to be fixed! I used the product twice only and the pump wouldn't dispense any product. I finally got it to dispense some product after numerous tires, and and dispensed very little amount. I am not impressed. Also, not travel friendly at all being in a glass bottle.
Love the way the product smooths and cleanses my skin, but not thrilled with pump. In order to get enough cleanser for my face, I have to pump it about 15 times!

This is a great cleanser that smells like fruity pebbles. And has gentle exfoliants that allows me to use it daily on my super sensitive and dry skin. It does not leave my skin feeling stripped or squeaky clean. But I do only use it in the mornings because of the fruity scent.

I absolutely love this cleanser. As someone with fair, dry, sometimes sensitive and often just odd skin I have tried almost anything to even my complexion and cleanse my skin and this does it!   This cleanser helps my makeup go on better and I can tell a huge difference when I don't use it.   If you're looking to have a brighter complexion I highly recommend trying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i've never used a cleanser that gave me instant results like this one does. As soon as I rinsed my face, I'm literally glowing and my pores might as well be nonexistent, they're so tiny. the scent is natural and refreshing. i've been a sunday riley die-hard but tata harper is becoming a close second

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It worked fine but I couldn't stand the scent. Exfoliation was really good though. A little rough for every day but once a week would probably be fine for my super sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this in the morning as my cleanser and exfoliator. This is a 2 in 1 product. The price tag is a little on the higher side but using this for both my cleanser and exfoliator saves me money in the long run. My skin is loving this product and my skin feels smooth.

Smells amazing and leaves my skin feeling fresh and smooth. I have combination skin and this cleanser hydrates and balances my skin out very well. Been using this for four months (on my second bottle) and my skin has improved. Will definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm new to Tata Harper - I like the cleanser.  As it is used on dry skin it does exfoliate.  It feels great on the skin and smells yummy.  I find that I have to use another cleanser for the eye area which is a little annoying so I've been using this cleanser just 2 or 3 times a week when I have a little extra time.  Overall I like it and love the fact that the ingredients are so natural.

reviews.review_title: Love the product, hate the pump
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This works wonders for my super dry skin with rosacea.  The downside is halfway through the bottle the pump stopped working.  Fix the pump please Tata!
I like that my face is clean afterwards, but I felt it wasn't no different than any other cleanser. I didn't see a big difference.

I tried this as a sample and fell in love. It's a little strange to on your face dry (as directed), but once I rinsed it off my face looked a lot brighter and even!! WOO HOO! I just purchased the smaller size... I think it's worth it but I do wish it was a little cheaper
This product works great with my skin. I use it once a day instead of the recommended twice a day. It leaves my skin soft and refreshed.
The only thing good about this product is the scent. They should make this scent in a misf and stop making skin care!

reviews.review_title: Does not cleanse well or improve the skin texture.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this cleanser because it was recommended to me. As it is both a cleanser and an exfoliant in one I decided to give it a try. Big disappointment, (after using it for one month day and night) it did absolutely nothing for my skin. The skin did not feel well cleansed after, but felt like I needed another cleanser to fully clean my face, also it did not leave my skin nice and plump, instead it was dry and dull. My skin is acne prone so this made it worse. Went back to Sunday Riley cleanser which is absolutely amazing!

reviews.review_title: You'll love this if you use it efficiently!
reviews.review_text: It took me a few weeks to love this product because there is a bit of a learning curve. I wasn't sure at first how much of this I should use at a time but now I use three to four pumps of this only in the mornings. I use this to give my face a good 'scrub' on dry skin, then I wet my hands and continue to rub until the formula starts to dissolve. Then I rinse. This product rinses much 'cleaner' if you use it in this way and you may not need a second cleanse. I do however use a pump of Sunday Riley Ceramic Slip afterwards just because I'm oily/combination-skinned and I treat this as more of an exfoliant than a complete cleanser.  I ONLY use this in the mornings or before masks because this is not intended to be used on 'wet skin' and it is definitely NOT a makeup removing cleanser. I suggest removing your makeup beforehand and drying your face completely before you use this or you will be sorely disappointed  in this product!   Now that I use the right amount of product for my face, I've really come to love this stuff! It is soo exfoliating and has a lovely non-chemical scent. I find it to be very scruby even though the particles are super fine which I love. Great exfoliating cleanser for sure.

I love this cleanser.  When I purchased it, I intended to use the cleanser only in the evening and then use another cleanser in the morning.  BUT, the Tata Harper cleanser is gentle enough to use both evening and morning.  My face is clean, feels clean, smooth, and brighter.  Well worth the cost, and I will repurchase.
I have sensitive skin, so this exfoliator was too rough for me. The only areas that tolerated this product was on my neck and forehead. Otherwise, loved the smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this cleanser so much. It was the first cleanser I ever purchased that cost more than $20 and let me tell you it is not worth it. First of all, this is the first time I feel compelled to write a review For a product, it was that disappointing. First of all, the most frustrating thing about this cleanser was that it did not make my face feel clean, I always felt the need to wash my face with a foaming cleanser first and then use this just for the exfoliating properties. It did exfoliate but that isn't surprising since it has rough pieces in it, crushed apricot pits, or something like that. Next, the MOST annoying part of the incredibly expensive product (for what it is) the pump stops working after 3 or so times of use, and I had to get creative with getting the product out of the bottle, not easy when you are trying to wash your face, I like to pump and get on with my routine. Also, this is such a small amount, truly if you use the $40 bottle twice a day, you will run out of the product in about 3 weeks, I'm being generous.  I was so incredibly disappointed in this product especially since I went into this believing I was going to be blown away. I ended up keeping it only because by the time I gave this product enough time to give it a chance, 2 weeks, and one more week only using it once a day since it was running out, I had hardly any left. I didn't want to be that person that uses most of a product and then returning it. I would never buy this again and I would never recommend this. I did love the smell however, I suppose that's something? However I picked up the Ole Henricksen African Red Tea cleanser and it smells similar if not better. I also use Bobbi Browns Oil cleanser before the OH and use and enzyme peel daily to exfoliate and my skin looks and feels amazing.
