I didn't even finish this bottle, I will give it to a friend to test.

I have oily/combination skin, got a sample, used twice, both time I felt like my face wasn't clean enough, my nose still felt oilier than the rest of my face after each wash. And it's so expensive, there are better options. Why is this an Allure winner?

This is amazing! I have rosacea and dry to normal skin. This tones down the red significantly and keeps my skin balanced. It feels smooth and hydrated. I highly recommend! I will be switching to this cleanser for life. Love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really wanted to like this. I gave it 2 really honest to goodness, fair shots at making it work. It just didnt. Leaves a filmy feeling after use, which I am just not ok with for a cleanser. Didnt feel it really exfoliated my skin either. Love the scent and her line, but this just didnt work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: best cleanser. hands down. end of story. holy grail.

reviews.review_title: Great if you know what you're looking for
reviews.review_text: This was amazing. I personally don't care if a skincare product costs an arm and a leg if it's worth the money. I have acne prone skin (but I don't have acne just minor breakouts) and oily/combo skin. This is perfect. It prevents breakouts from happening and it controls my oil well. People with oily skin aren't supposed to use abrasive products. Which is a common misconception. Give this product some time. It works!

My first review.....I just had to write a review.  The product is okay but I'm so annoyed at the fact that the pump no longer works!   I've tried cleaning it, but the product no longer draws up thru the tube.

I have been searching for years to find a face wash that I truly love. I have tried everything from drugstore products to high end without any success until I decided to go out on a whim and buy this cleanser. Omg I'm so glad I did...after one use I honestly noticed a difference. My skin is so much more clear, the acne I used to get around my jaw/cheeks is completely gone. It's taken away some redness around my t-zone too. My face has such a healthy glow. It smells like Froot-Loops..its claim is natural fragrance. This stuff seriously is amazing, try it out. The price is intimidating but it's so worth it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne , oily skin , I read reviews about this product before purchasing it. It is a light exfoliation for everyday use as it claimed, i did not find this helpful. My skin did not improved, and it actually got worst after using it. The price were high, the only thing i like about it is the texture and appearance It bottle seems what a luxury brand would use, heavy and is pumped head so is easy to get the product out.  I will not buy this product anymore and will not recommend for troubled skin. Probably people who have normal skin will like this product. .

I am on my second bottle of this cleanser and absolutely LOVE it! I use about 4 pumps and before I put it on my skin I breath in the fresh citrus smell. It is a creamy cleanser with little exfoliating things inside and I have not had a breakout since I started using it! Leaves my skin fresh and clean without stripping it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a no-foam cleanser with tiny scrubs. I have normal skin and occasionally have acne if the product I use is too oily. This cleanser didn't cause me any trouble. I used it in the morning because it is really gentle and moisturizing. Plus it smells awesome and makes me happy. Unfortunately, it doesn't have enough power to take off my makeup and/or sunscreen in the evening.  I don't have large pores or dull skin so I didn't notice any effect in pore minimizing or glow improvement. But sometimes the scrubs are so tiny that they were hard to get rid of. I had to use a towel/sponge to make sure they were completely gone.   Overall I think it will be good for dry skin and morning cleaning. But for the price, I'm glad that I didn't purchase the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For the price tag, I was really hoping this product would do something amazing for my skin. I really liked the smell (it smells like fruit loops) and it did make my skin soft after using, but it didn't really do much else. Didn't make my pores smaller, make my skin glow, etc. I read on other reviews that 1 pump is enough to cover your whole face but I felt like I needed 2-3 pumps at minimum, which didn't make the product last very long.   I would have given it 1 star if I returned it, but since I kept it I will give it 2 stars. I would look to spend $40 elsewhere on a different facial cleanser.
This stuff is great. Recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great great GREAT job at cleaning and exfoliating!! Makes your face so smooth in a such a short time, it's incredible! And the grapefruit smell is always nice and fresh (if you like it of course).   Only problem is the price. Way too expensive for me to buy as my regular cleanser or even just for weekly exfoliation.

I didn't find that this really did anything beneficial for my skin. It smells great and is very gentle on the skin. The pump clogs up and only half way through the bottle I couldn't even get the product to pump out. There are better products for a lot less that do more for your money.

Love this product!  I received as a sample and the results were amazing. I am 50 and this product makes my face glow and it is so soft and smooth. I bought immediately!  I often just concentrate on moisturizers and forget about the surface. This product is the answer.

I really enjoyed the scent of this. Most of all I liked the way it exfoliated (fine exfoliants) and made my skin feel. I only had a sample so I got about 3 or so uses out of it. May end up buying it though!
I love this it smells so good. I wish I hated it but I don't. Worth the $$$.
I use this as my evening cleanser with Sunday Riley as my morning cleanser and I cannot believe how quickly I noticed a difference. My skin is vibrant and clear without any drying side effects.
I wish I hated this. And every time I use it I wanna cry. But since using this my skin has been a lot better (dry/sensitive acne prone) and I love that it smells just like fruit loops cereal
This product truly cleanses and exfoliates like nothing I've ever tried. Love it!!!
This is one of my favorite cleansers! My face feels so clean and soft after I use it. It's not harsh! I use it every other day.
I was disappointed, I decided to take the plunge and sprint the $$for this cleanse. I've used drug store brands far superior to this one.

I've been using this cleanser for several weeks and am enjoying it so far. I love the orange-y dreamsicle scent. The exfoliating factor has been keeping me flake free and my skin bright, and I find it gentle enough to use morning and night without redness. Removes all of my makeup save a little mascara.   All this being said, I will probably try something new once my bottle runs out. Not saying I won't go back to it though!

I have combination skin that is prone to breakouts. I've never had smooth skin and this product has saved my life!! My skin is so much softer and smoother & no more blemishes!! I only use it at night, every other day as my skin is very sensitive and thin. Will buy again and worth every penny!

I kid you not, I've tried about 8 cleansers and this has by far met every expectation. I would get random break outs and I also have redness. This product has prevented break out, cleared them up and helped my redness. It leaves the skin feeling buttery smooth and smooth. I have dry skin and most cleansers before this one dried me up even more! But not this one!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is seriously by far my favorite cleanser. I have tried and loved so many (Boscia detoxifying cleanser and Kate Somerville exfolikate) But seriously, this cleanser is amazing. My face has never been so clear and glowing. I have actually had compliments on my complexion without makeup on and its amazing. The scent is awakening and afterwards your face feels so fresh and clean! I'd recommend this to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ii love this. After reading reviews I almost did not buy it. I am glad I did. I think the people who don't like it did not read the directions to put it on a dry face. I do and it removes my make up (maybe not all of my mascara, but what does?) in 1 wash. My skin feels great. I love Tata's products!

reviews.review_title: loved it but the pump stopped working half way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great exfoliater that doesn't feel harsh on your skin. I absolutely loved it. My two negatives are the bottle is glass (which when I use in the shower gets me a bit nervous) and more importantly, the pump stopped working (tried unclogging it to no avail) about half way through, I had to get creative on getting the remainder of the product. That would be my only concern with purchasing this item again.

Like it says in my title nothing special and very expensive, the size not worth the price. The scent is annoying. Make me break out it just dont work like they say it is (allure beauty winner) totally deception

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this May 14 and was very excited to try it. The first time I used it I had to pump about 5-6 times to get a decent amount of product, but I loved it. My skin looked really bright and even. However, I noticed that by pumping 5-6 times I had made a huge dent in the bottle. I decided to use less. I used it for about 2.5 weeks and used only 3 pumps day and night. I never really got the same result as that first time AND TO MAKE THINGS WORST, THE PUMP STOMPED WORKING. I couldn't believe it, only had it for 2.5 weeks and the pump wasn't working and half the product was already gone. This is a pricey cleanser and you need to use a lot of product to get a good result. I would have thought that for such a high price and glass bottle, they would have a better pump.

After years of trying to find a cleanser that actually works for my skin I think I FINALLY found the one! The best part is that tata harper's products are non toxic! You can feel and see the difference after just the first cleanse. I look forward to trying more products from this line, definitely worth the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a non foaming all natural daily exfoliator, i love this stuff, all of tattoo's cleansers are good but this is just great! It leaves skin soft and supple and glow-y. and to top it off it smells amazing which makes it a perfect morning cleanser! new HG!

Super gentle ( for me anyway ) I have normal/dry skin. I love the fact that it's a cleanser/ exfoliant, you can feel the difference in your skin right after. I don't use it as an everyday cleanser more like twice a week or when my face feels it needs a little extra.
I'm huge on skin care products. This refreshes my fave, brightens it and it simply feels great when I use it, smells so good too! I use it in the mornings not on a daily base. I will keep buying it!

This smells great and the bottle is so pretty on my vanity. The pump is difficult though; I have to pump about 10 times to get enough out to wash with. Also the instructions say to use morning and night but it's waaay too abrasive for that. Every few days max! But I love the way my skin looks and feels after I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is the best thing that I have tried so far. I bought it three days ago and I already feel a difference in my skin. My face feel so soft ,the pores are gone and my dark spots start to banish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very Expensive but so wonderful seeing my face glow. It leaves my skin hydrated and smooth.  I will try some of the other products Tata Harper has to offer and hopefully they will leave me just as happy as this one did.

I've been using this cleanser for about a month and I'm loving it. My face is super soft, the product smells nice, and there's some weird convenience (for me) using it on dry skin - I'm obsessed. I have, uh, less than perfect skin and I have experienced skin texture improvement while using this product. Five stars for the product, but the packaging needs improvement. I like the glass bottle, but the pump is difficult to use (hence, the review title). Overall, I will buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I heard so much about the TATA HARPER line and was really looking for a cleanser to help with my adult acne. I felt like this would be a great in addition to my acid toners to keep my skin clear. Unfortunately, I think the essential oil fragrance irritated my skin when red itchy bumps showed up on my forehead. I was super bummed because other than that the cleanser left my skin super soft and was a pleasure to use. However, I will not be repurchasing. Stop using fragrance even if natural, who cares how it smells!!

reviews.review_title: Not gentle. Don't recommend for sensitive skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin.  Bought it when they were doing a demo. Seemed good then but after using this and the resurfacing mask for a couple months my skin got so bad, especially my cheeks. Small bumps of red and whiteness developed and it was itchy too!  Sad because it was pretty expensive and its natural(?). The smell was nice too. But it was very abrasive to my skin :(
Definitely a light and gentle cleanser. I can feel the difference on my face when I don't use it!
Love that the product is natural.  Might be too abrasive for skin though.

I have been on the hunt to a different cleanser I absolutely love the one I've been using. A Sephora sales representative recommended this one to me and I love it, a mild scrubbing and hydrating for my skin which is normal

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok. I've tried a lot of cleansers. I have normal-dry skin with the occasional breakout and just haven't gotten excited with any of the cleansers I've been using. But this one is incredible. Smell is actually really important to me because I like to have a spa like experience with my skincare routine and this cleanser has a lovely light refreshing clean scent. When I take off my makeup at the end of the night and use this cleanser my skin honestly looks better than it does with foundation on. As a result, I've been wearing a lot less foundation. Love love love this.

Leaves skin feeling super soft and hydrated! Great for people with dry skin. I have super dry skin and have tried everything including expensive treatments like LaMer and La Prairie and this is the only cleanser that doesn't leave my face feeling tight and dry afterwards. Also, it smells great!!

I never write reviews on products but felt compelled to write one for this product. I saw it as a recommendation from a YouTuber and it is amazing. I didn't think the price was out of line for the amount but it has made my skin so soft and smooth in the few days I've been using it. I don't think the scent is strong at all but do agree only a small amount comes out of the pump. I use 4-5 pumps and find that's enough product. Will re purchase this for a long time to come. Love love love
Enjoyed the feeling of the mild exfoliant and the smell but it's pricey and I didn't find it better than my other go-to products. Likely won't buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this product and am glad I shelled out the money for it.  This is the grown-up version of the apricot scrub we all used in high school, which actually may have ripped up our skin a bit.  This cleanser's natural microbeads are so finely milled that you will not damage your skin, and this leaves your skin absolutely stunning and hydrated.  I am so happy with this product I will try a few more Tata Harper products because I want to start using high-quality and natural ingredients.  I LOVED the scent and did not find it strong (citrus scent) but I know some people are sensitive to it so be aware that there is a scent associated with it.  That being said, it is due to the natural citrus oils in the product and I absolutely love it.  Wakes me up in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is so good it doesn't make my skin dry afterwards or strip it either. It's super gentle on my sensitive combo skin where i can use a chemical exfoliator afterwards and I don't get irritation or anything. It hasn't improve blackheads though but it does make my skin look more even.
After 1 week I saw the marks on my face were less defined and my pores smaller. I also love that fact it's natural ingredients and the way the company operates.

Been using this product for about a week now and haven't seen a difference at all. Love that it cleanses my face without drying. The pump is super annoying tho. It seems like the product is to thick for this pump and dispenses a very small amount at a time, like tiny. I have to pump about 15 times to get a decent amount out. Overall it's an okay product but seems to me that it is highly overpriced for what it is worth for me personally. Most products you pay for is half the product and half for the name but to me this feels like you pay 3/4 for the name and 1/4 for the product. I have not tried any other products in this line but will not purchase this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have recently made the switch to all non-toxic and organic skincare/makeup, and Tata Harper 100% falls into that category. I have also been dealing with some major skin changes as I have gone off my hormonal birth control pill. My skin used to be extremely dry, and now I'm learning how to care for combination/oily/acne prone skin. I haven't had pimples since I was a teen, so dealing with breakouts in my late 20's was something very new to me. This exfoliating cleanser is truly gentle enough to use morning and evening, and extremely effective in cleaning out my pores. I simply use this as a cleanser then light serum for moisture, and I'm on my way! I finally found something that is made with great ingredients and does the job of strong chemicals. Read the instructions carefully and first apply to dry skin to activate the enzymes. The packaging is also really nice to look at on my counter!

reviews.review_title: Favorite Tata product, but still average
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite Tata product I have tried so far (and I've tried nearly all of them). However, it is still a fairly average cleanser. It does exfoliate gently my sensitive skin, which is nice. But the SMELL is so strong!!! Beware! Honestly, there are cheaper products that do just as good of a job or better at cleansing and exfoliating my skin.

I enjoy using this cleanser a few times a week to help keep my glow alive. It's got scrubby bits but they're crushed to a powder so this cleanser is quite gentle and you only need a gentle scrub to achieve beautiful results. I'm a fan of the scent so this is an A for me. I've only just started using Tata products a few months ago and so far I am impressed and my skin agrees.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this, and fell in love. I have sensitive, hormonal, angry, oily skin. So angry. This soothes it, instantly. It smells delightful, not over powering. And my face! I know I shouldn't touch my face, but my skin is so velvety and soft. My pores are smaller. Fine lines don't show up with makeup as much! The price put me off at first, but really, this is a skin care game changer for me and it's for sure going to be one of those things I make sure I always have an extra of in case I run out.

Recently, I started to think more and more about ingredients that go to the skincare. We get our skin only once for the whole life plus what we use for our skin gets sinked it to our body. But also I have problematic skin, with pores getting clogged VERY easily, and acne scars. So I need something that will actually work! It's an amazing cleanser that cleanses but doesn't strip mu skin. I have combination only skin, and I found out that stripping the skin from natural oils is not good. I use it in the morning because at night I use clarisonic, and you can't use this cleanser with any tool! Love Tata Harper skincare! Use her line for everything and it CHANGED MY SKIN!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how soft this product leaves my skin, feels sooo clean and refreshing. However, it breaks me out so I use it maybe two or three times a week with an acne fighting mask after. It smells like fruit loops but doesn't linger so you really don't need to worry. If you don't use it too often it's great and makes your skin feel healthy!

reviews.review_title: I would not buy this again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is expensive and your skin looks the exact same after using it. I am not impressed. The glass jar is super heavy and just waiting to crash off my ledge in my shower. The scent is nice, but your pores will look the exact same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: smells great, beautiful packaging, i highly dislike that you have to use it on dry skin, it just seems harsher on the skin. the little grains on dry skin just dont seem to be something that could be used daily so im unsure if i want to keep this and ive tried other exfoliators that left my skin a bit more soft that this $38 one

reviews.review_title: Great in Combination with Resurfacing Mask
reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like to use this cleanser after rinsing off the resurfacing mask to scrub off any remaining dead skin cells. Leaves skin clean and fresh

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got the small tester kit as a gift and ended up loving the products so much, I bought the full sized bottles. Smells great, cleans great and leaves skin feeling amazing!
This is my favorite cleanser ever. It smells like Fruit Loops, exfoliates wonderfully, and leaves my skin feeling fresh and glowing. So expensive, but I love it anyway.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this as my primary AM cleanser. I have true combo skin, and I love how this is so refreshing! I apply it to dry skin, then rinse off with warm water. My skin is left soft, balanced and ready to accept the rest of my skincare regimen. It's not super rough on the skin either, making it perfect for daily use. I've had mine for a few months now and I'm halfway done with the bottle (I have the smaller size), so for me, it feels like I'm getting my money's worth. The only thing that I take issue with is the pump - sometimes it won't pump out at all which is odd.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am amazed with this company, I kinda love all the products and how my skin feels, especially considering that I have a very sensitive and reactive type of skin. But what I love the most it is how this cleanser leaves my face feeling bright and healthy as same time. I totally recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There needs to be a cleanser in between the biggest and smallest at a reasonable cost to attract more buyers to this product. Overall, this seems to be a fabulous product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this maybe a couple times a week or when my skin is looking troubled. Exfoliates with enzymes so its super gentle and smells delicious! I use it with dry hand on my dry face to activate the enzymes and then just wash it off in the shower.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this cleanser since I first tried the tiny sample. I saw immediate results and my skin felt incredible! I honestly believe it is the 100% natural ingredients--plants and pronounceable things, not icky chemicals--that make this product the wonder that it is. And it smells delightful.  Be good to your skin and use this high quality, real-ingredient cleanser!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given a sample of this at my local Sephora store, and WOW! There was enough in the tiny sample to last me a full week. I only use this product in the morning, mostly because the gentle exfoliating makes my skin look amazingly refreshed, and my makeup look flawless.  I have recently ditched all toxic products (there were SO many!), and I am replacing all products with 100% natural and nontoxic products. I don't know why this took me so long to finally do, but I am so glad I did. Tata Harper is more pricey than other brands, but it is 100% worth it.  I wake up, put one pump (that's all you need for your whole face) on my dry face, and rub it around in small circles. I then rinse it off with lukewarm water. I apply my face serum (Previse), followed by my coffee bean eye cream (100% Pure), then finish with a face lotion (Kahina Giving Beauty), and my EOS lib balm. I get a TON of compliments on my skin.  If you're ready to commit to a natural, non-toxic product, this is the best one to buy. If you're only going to buy one, buy this one.I'm 32, olive skin, and combating the first signs of aging. I couldn't be happier with this product. Sephora, please bring more non-toxic options to your customers!!!

reviews.review_title: Loved the sample, but the full-size is just okay
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fell in love with this after using a sample. The fragrance is fantastic. A little bit orange blossom, but not overwhelming. The full-size version, however, just wasn't as effective. Less exfoliating, a little oilier than the sample, and the pump is terrible. Have to pump and pump to get enough product for a single wash. Packaging is also rather wasteful given the natural angle of this line. Glad I tried it, but I doubt I'll be back for more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This only works if you use it on a dry-ish face... for example i usually take my makeup off the regular way then tap dry my face and use the cleanser. Use the Tata Harper lotion after cleansing and I feel brand new!

reviews.review_title: love the product not the price
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love it!!! Best cleanser ever hands down!! Makes your skin feel so good and smells delicious!...the price however is not my favorite definitely hurts a little to buy this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I can't get enough of the Regenerating Cleanser. It smells amazing and feels great on my face. I never thought twice about washing my face before & now it's the first thing I want to do when I get home at night because this product just makes my skin feel so good. I tend to wash my face twice. The first time to remove my makeup and the second time to really clean my face. This is my favorite Cleanser & it smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is beautifully refreshing and very gentle on my sensitive skin. This is not a makeup removal type of cleaner, more of like a morning or second cleanse kind of deal which is exactly what I wanted. I feel so clean and refreshed after using this but not at all stripped. My only gripe with this product is that despite how beautiful it is, is the value for money (or lack thereof). It's way too expensive for what it is and how far it goes even if you can afford it. I will blow through this in no time and can't afford (or justify) using it regularly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The jury is still out on this one. I can say for $38 I expected a much better pump. I have to pump it 8-9 times to get enough to do a second cleanse.
I love this product! It feels like a mini facial

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I used it, my skin was a bit reddened but I tried again and it was great! I was lucky enough to meet Tata at a beauty event in Laguna Beach, CA where I received a 15 minute consultation with her. She told me to use this cleanser in the morning only along with the resurfacing mask until some white creamy texture developed. Then I follow with floral essence spray, then anti-aging serum, eye cream and replenishing nutrient oil complex. I have always had red skin like rosacea and flaking skin in t-zone along with acne scaring, oily glands but dry in t-zone. I am very impressed that these products, even though they smell delicious and somewhat strong, did NOT cause any reactions or redness/tingling/burning. Finally glad to find a toxic-free, safe product for anti-aging, cleansing, etc. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this as a face polisher and I use it every morning in the shower. The directions say to use this at night as well but I find that using it twice a day is a bit too much as it is grainy and I don't want to over-exfoliate. I think of it more as a polisher than as a make-up remover because you definitely will not be using this remove your eye makeup. That being said, I'ver received a lot of compliments on my skin lately (I'm 42 years old) and I can see a visible difference on the clarity and the tone of my skin.

I was drawn to Tata Harper because I love natural products, but don't usually love the results they bring, and I heard this wasn't the case with Tata. It's true. This cleanser has given me great, glowing skin. Definitely not a makeup remover - I double cleanse at night with this as the second step in order to get all the makeup off.  Love the smell of this product as well - fresh and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tata did a whole video about how you should use this cleanser to exfoliate daily during your morning routine. I have sensitive, reactive skin, so I was skeptical, but I tried it. I even asked a facialist, who told me you don't need to exfoliate daily, but I did it anyway.  This one little change has made a HUGE difference in my skin. This cleanser exfoliates so gently, without compromising your skin's balance, that your skin just gets clear and soft and the results aren't temporary--I'm done with my first bottle and I can't imagine my routine without it. Definitely use it in the morning, or in the evening as the second step of a double cleanse. Seriously, it's changed my skin!

reviews.review_title: Loved it at first but then.....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is OK...I defiantly don't think its worth the price though. I don't feel like this cleanser removes my foundation completely unless I use another cleanser prior to using this. It is not foamy so I would not recommend using this with your clarisonic.

Wanted to love this when I received a sample as I use the purifying cleanser from the brand but I was disappointed.  Smells beautiful but I found it quite harsh for my skin. If your skin isn't overly sensitive I would definitely give this a try! I think that when you find the correct products from this line for your skin they are absolutely worth every penny.

Don't try it, just don't. Because you're going to love it, and then you're going to be ordering a 75$ cleanser regularly...  First off, I am a serial cleanser hopper. I have never found a cleanser that I stick with for more than a bottle or two.. This one might be the one for my combination skin. It leaves my skin so incredibly soft and clean after use, and it cleared up some pesky blackheads on my t-zone and chin quickly. I am not getting as oily during the day and my skin looks matte yet glowing throughout the day. I also adore the way this product feels during use and how it smells.  One thing I did notice using it on a dry face is that after awhile it sticks on your skin and doesn't seem to do much. Don't get more product, just wet your fingertips and continue cleansing your face. It relathers nicely. :-)

reviews.review_title: Left my skin super soft, but....
reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all let me say I ordered the wrong product, I was going for Tata Harpers Purifying Cleanser, my mistake. I figured I might as well try this out though.  This product smells great, and it left my skin super soft without feeling like I had used an exfoliator. I like that part, but my skin didn't feel super clean. I grabbed a cleansing cloth and sure enough I still had makeup on my face, a lot of it. This upsets me. I dont like toner, it dries my face out, so I dont feel like I should have to use it to be rid of all my makeup. Strike one.  I followed the directions to use dry on the face. I had to use a lot to get any kind of coverage. Trying a thin layer this stuff would melt into my skin, leaving it dry in seconds. The amount I had to use was huge, and it made a big dent in my bottle right off the bat. I could see that this product wouldn't last very long at all. Strike two.  This product goes back tomorrow. I wanted to love it, I tried to love it, I cant love it.
Love love love this cleanser. After only 3 days I see a huge difference in my skin. Acne and blackheads clearing and overall skin looks amazing. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser contains tiny particles that need to be massaged to be activated. I never use gritty scrubs on my skin, after I read about how they scratch your skin in medical school. However this does not contain plastic particles and it's really gentle. I would suggest massaging with it for atlas 5 minutes and then removing it with a washcloth. I usually use it on the weekends- it definitely makes my skin 'glow' and I've noticed it getting more even toned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cleanser for morning time. It has small granules that don't irritate my skin but slough off dead skin cells. I love that the ingredients are free of harsh chemicals. I have Rosacea and this product doesn't irritate my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this little beauty because of Caroline Hirons. It has been showcased in a few of her videos and her blog, so I was excited to try it. I don't care if a product is natural or organic. I care about results. I use this product every other day and within two weeks, my friend said my skin looked great. I credit this product. It does not leave that squeaky clean feeling, but rather, a nourished renewed feeling. It smells great, fruity, not like perfume. I would say the ingredients and story behind the brand back up the price. Great treat for your face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product yields good results used in moderation. Reducing to once a day (at night), rather than the two suggested on the bottle, allowed the positive to remain and the negative became....less negative. Frankly, the product is drying. No wonder, since the second ingredient is alcohol. It does brighten and smooth skin, but can be too much. That said, I haven't returned it and am allowing a bit more time to see how the new system (once a day) works. Also, I just have to say that Tata Harper has the worse packaging ever. One bottle was smashed to bits. The eye cream, which i love, had a top that was not fully severed from the bottom. I had to use tools to get it open. This never happens and I buy a lot of stuff! One star down -a half for bad packaging and a half for over zealous instructions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice cleanser/exfoliater....not too harsh and gets the job done. Use it in the morning to mildly exfoliate my face before makeup application.

When I purchase a cleanser at this high price I expect it to be good and at a minimum I expect the dispenser to work properly.......after a few weeks the dispenser dispenses drops instead of squirts. The cleanser is good but the lousy dispenser would prevent me from repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very unique formula for a cleanser. I am a bit skeptical about these 'all natural' formula, so this is not the reason why I like it.  This is a gentle cleanser/exfoliator hybrid. I use it in the mornings and apply a little bit on my face and massage it for a little bit - as I use it everyday I am gentle on my massage. Instead of rinsing it all at once I wet my hands a little and bring them to my face to continue to massage and make the most out of the product. Once I am satisfied I rinse everything to make sure there is no residue left behind. Yes, this is expensive, but you really don't need to use a lot and I feel that it will last for AGES.  The gentle exfoliating effect helps to keep my skin smooth and to get rid of any flakes that I might have. I use prescription strength retinol on my face 3 times a week, BHA exfoliator twice a day and other BHA's and this is still gentle enough for me.  I am not to crazy on the smell of it. It's very light and peachy, it doesn't linger and it wouldn't stop me from repurchasing.

I like to exfoliate daily and this is perfect, the first time I tried it I liked it but did not love it, after using this daily for about a month, iI began to notice that my skin was softer, smoother and radiant!! I now love this cleanser and will du00e9finetly buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is ok. It is slightly gritty and my skin feels smooth after I use it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this full size as a result of trying a sample I received... didn't realize it was supposed to be a conscious beauty, natural etc brand so that is not why I bought it but it is nice that it is. Unfortunately I expect vegan/natural brands to often be not a very nice quality, fragrance etc so I would not have expected this to be so nice as it is. Absolutely gorgeous quality - amazing fragrance (exquisitely fresh!), effective exfoliater without being harsh, great texture. Just love it; I usually rotate between 2 different evening cleansers so this replaces my other previous exfoliating one. My only complaint is that it is kind-of a small size for the price.
A cleanser with a mild exfoliant. Beautiful ingredients found in nature. Hydrates and makes skin look nice. Gentle enough for everyday. My skin type is normal. Smells great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: first of all I want to say I have combination skin with full blown rosacea. This stuff is amazing the whole brand. I barely have breakouts or flare ups thanks to this face wash and the moisturizer. This stuff works wonders. I bought the little sample kit and then bought a normail size one and let me tell you it is the best. It is natural so it does not have chemicals which I love since I have been organic everything for about 2 years now. I have tried other high end organic products but ths stuff workd way better. It cleans but does not irritate skin at all and it feels like your exfoliating as well. It does not leav your skin feeling dry if anything it feels refreshing and smells like pure heaven. :)

This is a great almost-daily exfoliator. I fell in love with a sample I had received and almost immediately purchased it. Doesn't irritate my sensitive skin, leaves me feeling glowy. I use it about every other day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this cleanser as a second cleanse or in the morning. It's gentle and smells rally good (like apricots). It's refreshing and feels non-drying. I got it as part of a mini set, but I don't think I will buy it at full price because it's pretty expensive for what you get.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing about this tells me I need to buy it again. Had wanted to try the brand, but not encouraged to try any of their other stuff based upon this face wash.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this stuff for the past year and it has made a huge difference in my dry, sensitive, irritable skin. My breakouts have almost been eliminated completely - a few hormonal zits here and there, but otherwise my skin is clear, even, and happy. It is exfoliating and contrary to some other reviews, does NOT foam, which took me a little while to get used to, but it cleanses deeply without drying my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser has small scrubbies in it, so be aware of that. It's in a glass bottle with a pump. The cleanser smells like fresh grapefruit, but it's a light scent. I remove my makeup with an oil cleanser, then use this, and my skin feels clean and exfoliated. It lathers up a little with water. Very nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably the perfect exfoliant. It's scrubby, but with tiny beads that don't tear your skin off. Doesn't dry your skin out, and has a lovely citrus scent. I use Retin-A, so my skin is sensitive, yet oily. This cleanser is pricey, so I use it sparingly, but I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Now a permanent fixture in my skin care routine. Leaves my skin feeling very soft and lovely! Great treatment for a glow, especially after a Canadian winter.
I've only had this for a few days

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS CLEANSER, specially in the AM. It is exfoliating but at the same time it is gentle and it leaves my mature, sensitive soft and glowing. I am also in love with the scent. I use a lot of the Tata Harper products in the travel sizes which I love and this is the first one that I've bought full size and will continue to do so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is very milky and does exfoliate. It does exfoliate existing acne and doesn't dry it out. But it does not treat it. So far its been a week. It is worth a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad I received a sampler for this cleanser! It smells fruity and clean. It exfoliates gently; I don't feel like my skin is being scrubbed. Best of all, it leaves my skin feeling soft, clean, and smooth. I think my skin brightens a little after wash too! I would definitely purchase the full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a cleanser worth writing about. It actually does leave my (sensitive and mature) skin glowing. I could see a difference immediately. I almost couldn't believe it when I looked in the mirror. And it also left my skin feeling soft and supple. This is a great way to start your day, or to get ready for the night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started doing a double cleanse some time ago and my skin has never been better (though credit also goes to supplements and using natural/organic skincare). I generally do not use scrubby cleansers as they tend to simply cause damage to the skin so I opt for chemical exfoliants but this cleanser is divine and very gentle. I use it either as my second cleanse in the evening or as my morning cleanse and it is fantastic. Not irritating, not drying, not in any way offensive to my skin (which can be quite sensitive). I would not use this as my first cleanse in the evening (makeup/sunscreen removal) as I only use cleansing balms/oils for that but as a second cleanse it is fantastic. No big scratchy particles tearing up your skin but incredibly effective. I was so not surprised to see Caroline Hirons recommend this recently. It really is that fabulous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily acne prone skin, but I still need to exfoliate occasionally and this is perfect for that. It doesn't irritate my skin at all and makes it glow beautifully. Got it as a sample and will definitely be buying the full size.

This cleanser is the perfect amount of scrub and moisturizer and cleanser. It leaves your skin feeling refreshed and soft. Not only that but it smells amazing! Kind of feels like you are washing your face with a lotion. I loved it and will be repurchasing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin and this stuff is amazing at both exfoliating but not scraping the skin of its natural moisture. A very gentle cleanser. And it being made in VT along with it being organic is just a bonus in my mind

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is amazing! It's a great exfoliate and even moisturizes at the same time. I have acne prone skin and have used proactiv for years but I've learned that moisturized skin keeps the breakouts away. I need more from my skincare line the older I get so I made a skincare resolution to try something more natural. I love the way my skin feels so clean and smooth after using this cleanser, and it hasn't caused any breakouts. The whole tata Harper line is amazing and every time I add something new from her line, I'm NEVER disappointed.

reviews.review_title: Love the product HATE the packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cleanser is fantastic as the 'second cleanse' in my routine. Smells like a spa and leaves my skin feeling clean but not striped of moisture. However the packaging is awful. It leaks when you travel with it, and there is no way to lock the pump. I'm about 3/4 way through the bottle and the pump keeps getting stuck. Not sure the product inside is worth the hassle of the packaging to be honest. It may be a deal breaker in terms of me repurchasing it.

Love this product. It was a sample in one of my very first orders and I couldn't believe how smooth and utterly clean my face felt after that single first use. I had to have more so I ordered the full sized bottle straight away. Sadly, it arrived broken in many tiny pieces, likely due to the harsh handling of the delivery persons. When I called Sephora they offered to send out a brand new replacement at no charge! What a lovely surprise to be greeted with such outstanding service. TATA Harper now has the premium spot on my sink. After a couple of weeks of regular use I am thrilled with my skin. Winters in Iowa are harsh but this cleanser has smoothed out and brightened my face and makes even the coldest snow and wind storms a distant memory each night. The light smell is intoxicating as well. Nicely done. I would recommend this to women and men as my husband tried it too...but he has to get his own bottle because this is mine mine mine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and loved it immediately so purchased the full-sized product.  First of all - consider watching the short video about the production of Tata Harper. For me at least, I like the business model of this line. That alone isn't enough to make me LOVE a product, but in this case, it added a few bonus points in understanding the brand.  This product is to be started on dry skin. This bothered me a little at first, but I did as instructed. It is creamy enough to use on dry skin - so I use it right before I jump in the shower.  It is very rich with the perfect size and amount of microbeads (aka 'very small grit'.) It is gentle. It leaves my skin looking and feeling wonderfully smooth, resurfaced and polished.  I liked the way my skin looked immediately. After two weeks, I actually had co-workers commenting that my skin looked 'brighter' and they asked if I was 'doing something different.  My skin does look smoother, brighter and more even.  I have terrible combination skin, so 3-4 times I week, after I use this, I do a 'double cleanse' with my anti-acne cleanser. This is NOT because this product doesn't clean enough - but I am prone to cystic acne and I am unwilling to give up my acne prevention steps.  This wonderful cleanser does not over-dry my dry areas. In fact, I develop dry patches quickly and this cleanser eliminated one pesky patch completely in just a few days.  It is nicely scented and although it may sound weird, it doesn't make me sneeze (Sadly this can be a problem with me so I am always relieved when a scented product I like doesn't make me sneeze!)  Overall - it is a wonderful cleanser and exfoliator. After 30 days of use, I am convinced this is a winner and will remain part of my regular skincare regime.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First-I do not NEED to find any more cleansers to love-especially expensive ones! However, I used a sample and HAD to buy it! High points: A little goes a long way, lovely, light scent, leaves skin soft not dry, gentle exfoliation-not big pieces of rock! I love Sephora because, if I don't love it, I can return free!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cleanser is non-drying and feels really good when it is on your skin. I swear you can feel it working. I love that it is all natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a little upset at how much i love this product because of the price tag. I know i'm going to have to repurchase! The exfoliating agent in it is super fine and leaves my skin feeling super soft. It also helps with the blood circulation in my face. Using Tata Harper's Resurfacing Mask after washing my face with this cleanser is literally as good as getting a facial.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smelled so fresh, and was so gentle. My skin actually looked a bit brighter after using it once. It didn't dry out my skin either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this and I LOVE it!! It left my skin feeling clean, but not dried out. I will be buying the full size of this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is perfect and gentle for my skin, especially in the winter when my skin takes a beating. This stuff smells wonderful and leaves my face feeling moisturized and soft. I use this after washing with my Boscia cleansing oil (I double-cleanse). The only downside is the price, but so far it seems well worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this in a sample packet and I absolutely love it!!! I might just purchase the full size :) Not to mention the smell!! It smells like Orange Sherbet!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got a sample sachet in a skin care set and completely fell in love. After one use, my skin was smooth and glowing. I am buying the full size for sure. Not too harsh of a scrub, smells great too.

I'm sorry to say this stuff is amaze-balls. Sorry because, have you seen the price? Note that this is NOT a makeup remover. It is strictly for cleaning the skin. What I think makes it work so well is that is has a ph of 5.0, so for me, at least, it leaves my skin with an intact and healthy lipid barrier. After two days of use I didn't bother with foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You will see beautiful results quickly. Pair this up with the resurfacing mask. Every brand I have tried, this is the only one you'll ever need or want. Lasts a long time too.

reviews.review_title: i am in love with this cleanser
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy I finally purchased this cleanser during the friends and family discount. it is worth the price! the pump only puts out a small amount at a time so even though it's pricey, it will last a very long time. you also only need about 3-4 pumps at most. the scent is intoxicating and makes you feel very pampered and luxe. the exfoliation feels good but is not too strong. I only wish it was not in glass since I keep in the shower... I just have to be careful with the bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this in my seeming never ending search for a HG cleanser. SA in store raved about it and said although it is somewhat expensive, she only needs three pumps to fully clean her face so it lasts a long time. I've used it for about three weeks now and while it smells lovely, I'm unimpressed with its cleaning abilities. I need a good seven or eight to feel like I get my whole face covered, but perhaps the SA was using a Clarisonic, which I am not. After using it last night a FAB pad still had makeup on it and I wasn't wearing a lot. I had to re-clean with another cleanser. It gets 2 stars for the natural ingredients and the smell but for the cost and its cleansing abilities, I won't be repurchasing. The search continues...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells delicious, feels amazing on the skin and makes you feel super clean and pampered. What more can you ask for? This is probably the best organic cleanser I have ever used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best cleanser I have ever used! I have very dry skin and it doesn't dry out my skin at all. The scent is amazing too. Smells a little like fruity pebbles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is nice cleanser with grains in it to help gently exfoliate. It smells wonderful. Your skin will feel clean and not stripped too clean, which is a great bonus for a facial cleanser. The 3 is being given because of price. $75, even with using top clean ingredients is just too much for a daily exfoliating cleanser. There are many effective high end cleansers that are 1/2 or almost 1/2 the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved all of the Tata Harper face products. I purchased them in a trial set twice before committing to the full size versions. I really liked this cleanser a lot until a month or two into using it, I developed an allergy to it in the form of contact dermatitis under both eyes. I have never had an allergy to anything before so this was a disappointment! It's all natural so I have no idea what I'm allergic to. As soon as I stop using the products, it goes away and when I restart it comes back within a couple of days. I stopped and started 3 times to make sure it couldn't be anything else. I was so pleased that Sephora was willing to let me return those that I hadn't used at least half. It's an expensive thing to have to throw away due to an allergy. Too bad because they are really nice products.

I have only been using this for a little while but I am already in love! My skin feels so soft and is really clear! I didn't think I had dull skin before I tried this cleanser but it is so bright now it's unbelievable. My skin is generally really oily in some spots and extremely dry in others (think eczema dry) and although it's not perfect it has balanced out a lot! I will definitely repurchase and try other products in the line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this product line. I was ready to throw down a few hundred for a holy grail skin product line but this just isn't it for me. I gave it only 3 stars because of the price tag, the smell (think orange creamsicle in a line of products that all smell herbaceous and essential oil-like), and an absence of wow factor. That said, I don't dislike this product. I have dry, sensitive, rosacea prone skin and this is gentle enough to use daily if I chose to. I didn't break out but it also did nothing to improve my skin.

reviews.review_title: Best cleanser I have ever used.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of cleansers, from inexpensive to pricer and had resigned myself to the idea that cleansers aren't meant to improve your skin. Then I met Regenerating Cleanser and I have been proven wrong. I have rosacea, which makes me an nonideal candidate for this but my skin clogs very easily and I wanted to give it a try. I am very careful over my rosacea-prone cheeks and instead massage it over the rest of my face. It cleans my make up and makes my skin glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This face wash is great! It has a wonderful smell and does great things for my skin. You only need a tiny bit. I give it four stars because it is SO expensive and I wish they would package it differently. As the cleanser is so thin, it drips out quickly when you are trying to close it with the twisting cap.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Tata's products for nearly two years and really love this exfoliating cleanser. The scent is a pleasant energizing citrus and it isn't too harsh for my picky somewhat sensitive skin, but with that said I cannot use this daily, I have to use it every third day and can never get through the bottle before it expires (6 months), and since this is a natural product I stick to the date pretty strictly. I love it, just wish they made a smaller bottle for infrequent exfoliators!

I was combination skin in Asia in my 20s and I am mature skin in California in my 30s. I love the texture of this product, more watery like yogurt. Good hydration while cleansing & exfoliating the face & neck every morning! I usually leave it on 10 to 15 minutes for a quick mask. Smell wonderful too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: great cleanser/exfoliator but be careful if using for everyday use unless you're super oily as the micro beads do a great job of sloughing off oils/dead skin. only giving 4 stars b/c i think this should be more targeted as mechanical exfoliant rather than a cleanser but it does do a great job. i use the refreshing cleanser (i didnt see it on sephora's page) for everyday use..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tata's products are incredible. This cleanser is super concentrated and gives the perfect amount of exfoliation for daily use. If you use as directed you can really feel the enxymes doing their work and your skin will feel clean, soft, and radiant!
